title: Brittany Dudchenko-More Into The Life of Drew Brees' Wife
body:
Brittany Dudchenko is the wife of the American football quarterback Drew Brees. The couple has been together for over two decades. Brittany is also a proud mother of four kids with her husband. Do you know Brittany and Drew have been together since high school? Talking about her husband, Drew is an ex-football quarterback who spent a significant portion of his prolific football career, playing for the team New Orleans Saints. Unlike his huge popularity in the media, his wife Brittany has remained a little bit secretive about her life. Dudchenko is passionate about humanitarian works. She along with her husband run a charity Organization named The Brees Dream Foundation which helps cancer people. In today's topic, we will discuss all the related questions about Brittany, her early life, kids, and many more.

Who is Brittany Dudchenko? Insights on The Life of Drew Brees' Wife

Brittany was born on 15th January 1979 in Syracuse, Cleveland, Ohio to parents Pete Dudchenko and Kathie Dudchenko. Her parents' details have been a big mystery, so no more information related to Brittany's parents is available. As of 2022, the celebrity spouse is 41 years old. She holds Capricorn as a zodiac sign and is American by her nationality. Her full name is Brittany Middleton Dudchenko. Talking about her education, Dudchenko did her high school at Wawasee High School situated in Syracuse, Indiana in 1999. She later earned her master's degree in Industrial Management from Purdue University, in West Lafayette, Indiana.

When did Brittany Meet Her Hubby Drew?

The couple first met in 1999 at college. At that time, Brittany was Drew's junior. Drew was a sophomore in college. But they wouldn't begin dating instantly. It was his 20th birthday Drew thought to invite his college mates including his then-dream-wife Brittany. While his birthday party was going on, the footballer already had 17 shots and then decided to approach Brittany. The conversation was casual and Drew only talked about football. According to him,
" I made fool of myself when I first met her"
Although the NFL player's first effort was ruined, Drew already thought, "I'm gonna marry this woman." For the second time, the two met again six months after when their college invited all of them to the party and Brees knew that his now spouse would also be there. He said,
"I finagled my way to get invited to a party that I knew she'd be at."
After they met at the party, Drew asked Brittany for a date. But the fact is that the date wasn't exactly only for 2 because her friends were also with her to see the guy who had made a bad impression on Brittany on their first meeting. Same as Dudchenko, Drew also invited his colleagues to join them. In an interview with CBS NEWS, Drew opened up that her presence and aura mostly attracted him. But, at the same time, Brittany said it was rather her stature. She added,
I think it was more breeding stock (LAUGHS). He wanted me tall.
Later on, the lovers got engaged to be married.

Brittany Dudchenko Is Married to Her Husband Drew Christopher Brees For Nearly Two Decades

After dating for a long time, they thought of getting married. And on 8th February 2003, the couple exchanged their vows at Coronado, California in the presence of their family and close friends. On their 16th anniversary, the NFL player Drew posted a wedding photo of them expressing his love,
16 years ago today I marry this beautiful woman. I thak God for her everyay!
[caption id="attachment_2074" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Brittany Dudchenko and her partner Drew at their Wedding[/caption] It's been nearly two decades since they got hitched and their married life is going on a good path. Furthermore, her spouse Brittany has also posted a number of photos of his wife and kids on his social media handles. Back in Feb 2022, Drew uploaded a picture collection of the lovers on his official Instagram on their 19th anniversary. He captioned the image,
To the love of my life on our anniveresary.....I love this journey with you. Our best is yet to come.

Brittany Shares Four Children With Drew

The long-time couple has four children three sons and one daughter named Baylen Roberts Brees, Bowen Cristopher Brees, Callen Christian Brees, and the youngest is a girl Rylen Judith Brees. [caption id="attachment_2082" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Brittany shares 4 adorable kids with her husband Drew[/caption] Their first child a son Baylen was born on 15 January 2009. The second one named Bowen Cristopher Brees was born on 19 October 2010. The couple welcomed their third son Callen on 15 August 2012. And their youngest child in the family is their daughter Rylen Judith Brees who was born on 25 August 2014.

A Short Description Of Brittany's Husband  Drew Brees

Drew Christopher Brees is a retired football quarterback who appeared in 20 seasons throughout his NFL career before retiring in 2020. In 2021, Brees worked as an analyst on NBC Sunday Night Football.

Brittany Dudchenko Runs A Non-profitable Foundation Along With Her Husband

Brittany and her partner have established a non-profitable foundation called "The Brees Dream Foundation." This foundation works to support cancer patients and children who lack education and are from poor backgrounds. And the lovers established it in 2003 and the non-profit organization is running till now. In fact, the reason behind the establishment of the organization was Brittany's aunt, who died of cancer. Similarly, the charity has helped plenty of medical field and needy children. Similarly, during the pandemic of COVID-19, the couple also donated $5 million to Louisiana. Furthermore, in 2005, the former NFL player and his wife lend a hand to the people who were suffering from the damage after the Hurricane in New Orleans. The couple has also worked along with a couple of NGO organizations to build parks, hospitals, and educational institutions.

Net Worth Of Brittany Dudchenko

The estimated net worth of Brittany is about $500,000 in 2022. On the other hand, her spouse Drew's net worth is estimated at $22 million. He has earned an impressive fortune from his retired football career.

Where Is Dudchenko Now?

Dudchenko currently resides in New Orleans, LA along with her family. The mansion where the celebrity spouse is currently living was actually bought by her husband Drew solely. The lavish house consists of 3 Bedrooms with 2 half bathrooms and 3 bathrooms. While diving into the topic of Brittany's social media accounts, Dudchenko is active on Instagram.

title: Jahan Yousaf: The Producer Of Electronic Dance Music (EDM)
body:
Jahan Yousaf is a member and producer of Electronic Dance Music (EDM). She is also known as the DJ of the music band Krewella. The band Krewella consists of two members Jahana herself and her sister Yasmine Yousaf. She is a member of the band for long years and has also released a number of music albums so far. While her professional details are quiet in the media, the information about her dating life has remained private. So, let's find out who is Jahan dating in 2022. Has Yousaf ever linked with Casey Deidrick? Here is everything you are looking for her life including her love for tattoos, parents, siblings, and many other interesting facts!

Jahan Yousaf's Parents And Siblings

Jahan was born on 27th August 1989 in Northbrook, Illinois. As of 2022, she is 31 years old. Yousaf is the daughter of Sohail Yousaf and Neda. She holds the zodiac sign of Virgo and has dual nationality that is American and Pakistani. As for her ethnicity, Jahan has a mixed ethnical background as her mother Neda has Polish/German/Lithuanian descent. As per the sources, her father moved to the US from Pakistan for a better future. He currently works as a realtor in California. Jahan spent her childhood in Chicago, Illinois alongside her parents and sisters, Aisha and Yasmine. It seems like she has good bonding with her both of her sisters. [caption id="attachment_1999" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Jahan with her sisters Aisha and Yasmine[/caption] Talking about her educational life, Jahan who is fond of music completed her schooling at Glenbrook North High School, Northbrook.

Career Details: Jahan Runs The Band "Krewella" Along With Her Sister Yasmine

As already said before, Yousaf is now a core member of the band Krewella. She works as a producer and DJ for the band. Talking more about the musical band, it is an electronic dance music band from the Chicago suburb of Northbrook, Illinois. The band was formed in 2007 along with the Yousaf sisters and one other member Kris Trindl. The music style of Krewella is mostly known as EDM, dance rock, hardstyle, and dance-pop. [caption id="attachment_2000" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Jahan with the 2 Krewella members Yasmine Yousaf and Kris Trindl[/caption] The trio was actually created by Jahan during her school life with her sister Yasmine and Kris Trindl, where all of them were studying at the same school Glenbrook North High School. At first, everything was going well and the trio was getting huge success. They received plenty of contracts and also released a number of songs. But, things did not work well and the trio later split out in 2104. After the band dissolved, Kris left group.

Kris Trindl Filed An $5 Million Lawsuit Against Yousaf Sisters

As we said earlier that Trindl sued the Yousaf sisters for $5 million after he was allegedly kicked out of the group without his own will. He said while the band was still at the height of its success took a short break from his musical career to recover from his alcohol addiction. Therefore, Kris went to rehab to get over it and fully recovered, so that, he could rejoin the band. Following his recovery, he was back and rejoined the band. But, Kris already quit drinking and stopped partying. First of all, the Yousaf sisters also did not like Kris rejoining the band and they couldn't accept the truth that Kris wouldn't party anymore. Further, they thought that Kris was still in depression and the sisters started to take benefit of it. They eventually denied Kris's membership in the group. As per Kris, since the two sisters started to ignore Kris and did not want him to be in the group, he filed a lawsuit for $5 million against the two members of Krewella, Yasmine and Jahan. But, on the other hand, the Yousaf sisters claimed that Kris left the group by his own intention.

Was Jahan Yousaf and Kris Trindl Ever In a Romantic Relationship?

Despite the fact that Kris left the group, Kris and Jahan were in a romantic relationship while in high school. They both were pretty interested in the music and thought of making the band. The ex-couple later included Jahan's sister Yasmine too. When the band got formed, they were still dating. However, the reports of their split never came out to the media.

Did Jahan Actually Get Success Through The Band Krewella?

The answer is yes. She actually rose to fame through the band "Krewella." At first, Kris was the producer of the band, so Jahan and her sister released a lot of songs. But when the band Krewella signed to be a partner of the EDM youtube channel, they got a contract to sign with Monstercat music label. After the contract, in December 2011, the band released its first song Killing It. And it later promoted through social media and the EDM Youtube channel. They later came up with their first album Get Wet, which also listed on US Billboards within a few days.

Awards Of Jahan Yousaf

As Jahan has a huge fan following, she is loved and praised by everyone. She has done many live concerts too. As a result, she won the International Dance Music Award for Best Breakthrough Artist on 2012.

Is Jahan Yousaf Really Dating Casey Deidrick?

Many sources say Jahan once dated an American actor Casey Deidrick. They reportedly started dating in 2013. On September 27, 2013, Jahan even posted a picture of them with the caption “the tree and the troll. 🌲👹 @caseydeidrick.” [caption id="attachment_2001" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Jahan and her boyfriend Casey Deidrick[/caption] Though, as of 2022, there is no recent update on whether the couple is still dating or not, some sources claim that the two are still items.

Who is Her Boyfriend Casey Deidrick?

Her reported beau Deidrick is an American actor and singer. He is best known for appearing in the role of Chad Dimera on the NBC soap opera Days of our Lives. He was born on April 25, 1987. As of 2022, the actor is 35 years old. He was born to the parents Jon Deidrick, who works as an IBEW 332 Union electrician, and mother Denise Deck, who is a nurse.

Tattoo Lover Jahan Yousaf

Jahan is a tattoos freak. She has at least 10 known tattoos like the number 6-8-10 on her neck. Similarly, she has inked a mandala on her forearm, a rose on her neck, a tattoo of Kurt Kobain on her right forearm, and many more. [caption id="attachment_2002" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Tattoos freak Jahan Yousaf[/caption]

Jahan Inked the Tat 6-8-10 with Two Other Members of Krewella

Talking about the story behind the tattoo, it all happened while the ex-trio Jahan, Yasmine, and Kris decided to drop school and wanted to form a music band of their own. The trio dropped out of school on 8th June 2010, so to make the day memorable they all decided to ink that date as 6-8-10. Both sisters Jahan and Yasmine inked the number on their neck, whereas Krish inked on his arm. Jahan once explained why she inked a tattoo on her neck,
"I love neck tattoos, I’ve always loved it. For some reason everytime I get a tattoo, I like putting tattoos in dangerous places, because I love the idea of not regretting anything. And in twenty years I might have a really gross wrinkly neck, but whatever, you live with your mistakes."
As already mentioned before she also has a rose tattoo on her neck which also holds a short story,
"On the roses: “I love the idea of every rose has a thorn, everything that’s beautiful has something ugly with it, too. It also represents how I feel about success, you have to suffer in order to succeed. You have to try and fail, and try to win, and you have to sink to swim, that whole idea. I have a tattered rose where the petals of the rose kind of have holes in them. I love the idea of things that are beautiful in nature that have flaws in them too."

How Much Does Jahan Earn?

Yousaf has earned quite a decent amount of fortune from her musical career. And, as of 2022, her net worth is $1 million.

Her Social Media Handel

Jahan is pretty active on every social media handle. Among all the social media, Jahan is highly active on Instagram, where she posts about her daily life.

title: Who is Madeline Khan’s Husband, John Hansbury?
body:
John W. Hansbury is the celebrity husband of the late actress, and singer, Madeline Kahn. Kahn is an actress who played memorable roles in Paper Moon(1974), and Young Frankenstein(1975) among others. Apart from John’s fame as late Madeline Kahn’s former husband, what else is there to know about John’s life? Further, how did John Hansbury first meet his now late wife? Here in this article, we shall find out many interesting facts about John Hansbury including his age, career, wife, and net worth.

Who is John Hansbury?

The late Madeline Kahn’s husband John was born on June 1, 1951, in Rockport, USA. As of now, he is 71 years old. He is the son of Stephan (father) and Susan (mother). Moreover, he has an anglo-Saxon origin and has American nationality. When he was a child, John moved to Oberlin with his parents to complete his high school where he attended a local school. Since he liked debates from his childhood, it motivated him to become an attorney so he joined Antioch School of Law for his Bachelor’s degree.

John Hansbury is an Attorney

After receiving his JD, John became a fully-fledged lawyer. Since 1977, he has been registered as an attorney and he specializes in industries, government, and business. Moreover, after his wife Madeline's passing due to Ovarian cancer, he became a member of OCRA and vowed to help people fight ovarian cancer by creating awareness and campaigning for improved ovarian cancer treatment. Later, he became chairperson of that organization.

John Hansbury is famous for his marriage to Madeline Kahn

The former couple met in 1989 at music composer Jonathan Sheffer’s birthday party where Madeline was invited as it was also the party in the honor of their friend Gail Jacobs. This is where Hansbury first met his future wife Kahn. Additionally, they liked each other’s company from the moment they met. Regarding that night, Jacob stated, "It was the start of a romantic relationship." [caption id="attachment_1884" align="aligncenter" width="450"] John was married to Madeline for only two months.[/caption] Later on, they started dating though they had 9 years difference. While they were in a romantic relationship, John realized the challenges of Kahn's career and supported her during the worst days of Madeline’s professional and personal downfall. After decades of dating, the couple married each other on October 10, 1999. After their marriage, there was a rumor about their relationship being a publicity stunt that affected him internally this is why he stayed out of the limelight.

How did Madeline Kahn Die?

Madeline was diagnosed with Ovarian cancer in 1998. While she was being diagnosed, Madeline was still working for Cosby. But regardless of her health issue, Madeline still worked while going through treatment simultaneously. She went through three surgeries along with some experimental treatment. Despite all the efforts, the beautiful actress passed away. She succumbed to the disease, just two months after she married John, on December 3, 1999. She was cremated on December 6, 1999, at Garden Gate Cemetary.

Who was John Hansbury’s wife, Madeline Kahn?

She was born on September 29, 1942, the daughter of Freda and Bernard B. Wolfson. She was Jewish by ethnicity. Kahn was born and raised in Boston. Also, Kahn had two half-siblings from each parent by the name of Jeffery and Robyn. As a child, Madeline was sent to Manumit School and that’s where she was introduced to acting and worked on a few dramas there. After graduation in 1960 from Man Van Buren High School, Madeline received a drama scholarship from Hofstra University and studied acting, music, and voice therapy. [caption id="attachment_1885" align="aligncenter" width="450"] John's wife is famous for her role in several comedy shows.[/caption] Kahn debuted in Kiss Me, Kate as a chorus girl but her film acting journey started with the movie, The Dove in 1968. Her career rose to stardom after a nomination for best-supporting actress in the movie, Paper Moon(1973). After that, she worked on other projects like Blazing Saddles(1974) and Young Frankenstein (1974) which got nominated for Golden Globe Awards and Academy Awards.

Did John Marry anyone After Madeline?

According to The New York Times, John Walter Hansbury married Carisa Lynne Jackson on Jan 16, 2016. The ceremony was organized at Bill’s Food and Drink, a restaurant in New York. Talking about the bride, she is the daughter of Daniel J. Jackson and the late Anne L. Jackson. Moreover, Jackson is a partner in Water Island Capital, an investment advisory firm in New York. Furthermore, She graduated from the Fashion Institute of Technology. Currently, Hansbury and his wife Mrs. Hansbury are living in New York.

Does Hansbury have any children?

The lovebirds had a complication in their dating period because of Madeline’s acting career. In addition, Madeline was also going through a legal battle against her mother who had sued her numerous year throughout the year. This must have been the reason Hansbury and Madeline didn't plan on bringing any kids throughout the time they were dating. Moreover, the pair must have thought about welcoming a baby after their marriage but sadly, Madelin didn't make it. Besides, John also doesn't share any biological kids with his second wife, Carisa, though there are reports that they are planning to adopt a child.

John lives a reclusive life

Well, after the death of his first wife Madeline Kahn, there was a backlash about the marriage being a stunt, as mentioned earlier. He disappeared from the media and doesn’t have any account on any social sites.

John Hansbury’s Networth?

Hansbury has his own Law firm and is chairman of Ovarian Cancer Research Alliance which is the oldest and biggest Ovary cancer charity center, from which he made lots of earnings. In 2022, his estimated wealth was about $1 million.

title: Katherine Nicastro: Ex Wife Of Famous American Football Linebacker And Actor
body:
Katherine Nicastro is a realtor who currently works for Keller Williams Realty. She is also the celebrity ex-wife who came into the limelight after marrying famous Brian Bosworth, a former football linebacker and actor. He played three seasons of NFL with the Seattle Seahawks. Besides, talking about their marriage, Katherine and her ex-spouse Brian was in a marital relationship for years before their divorce. Do you know the former flames had a pre-nuptial agreement? How many children do they have? Well, here are a lot of facts you should know about Brian Bosworth's ex-wife Katherine including her life after divorce, current whereabouts, and more!

Katherine Nicastro's Biography

Nicastro was born in 1970, in Gloucester, Massachusetts, in the United States. As of 2022, her age is 52. Unfortunately, the information about her early childhood details including her parents, family details, and more is yet to be revealed. On the other hand, her ex-spouse Brian is 57-year-old as of 2022. Born and raised in Oklahoma City, Oklahoma, Bosworth played college football at the University of Oklahoma. Moving into her educational details, Katherine attended Macarthur High School, where her ex-hubby also went to.  She later studied at the Los Angeles Modeling Institute California to become a certified model.

Katherine's Height and Appearance

She has an attractive height and stands 5 feet and 6 inches (168cm) and her body weight is around 58 kg (128lbs). Katherine has hazel eyes.

What Does Katherine Nicastro Do For a Living?

Nicastro is a realtor by profession. She currently works as a real estate realtor for a company named Keller Williams Realty - Cherry Hill. However, any other details about her career aren't available in online tabloids. In the meantime, her former husband Brian a former football linebacker who mostly played for the team Seattle Seahawks. In addition to his football career, Brian is also the finest actor who has worked in dozens of movies and TV shows. Most notably, the actor has worked in movies like Stone Cold, One Man's Justice, Adam Sander, and more. Furthermore, Boz has also worked as a commentator for television broadcasts in XFL.

How did Katherine and Her Ex-Husband Brian Meet?

As we have already mentioned above, the former flames first came across when they both were at high school. Although the two clicked instantly, Katherine and her former hubby remained close friends for some time until their friendship turned into romance. As soon as Brian's career took off, they also started appearing occasionally in public. Here is a rare photo of both sharing the screen on 1986, [caption id="attachment_1855" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Katherine and her ex-partner Brain[/caption] Needless to mention, Nicastro and her then-boyfriend Brian dated for several years before they got hitched.

When did Katherine Nicastro get married to Brian Bosworth?

Talking about Katherine and Boz's marriage, the high schoolmates get married on December 12, 1993, in a private wedding ceremony attended by their friends and family members. They happily married for about thirteen years before things got a little bit complicated between the two. And they went their separate ways in 2006.

How Their Mariage Dissolved? Their Pre-nuptial Agreement

As we said earlier Katherine and her former husband Brian split after 12 years of their marriage. Nicastro filed for divorce from her then-spouse, citing irreconcilable differences as the reason behind their separation. As per TMZ, In her divorce petition, the ex-celebrity spouse sought equal custody of their kids. Besides, they also had a pre-nuptial agreement. So, their property and other possessions were divided as per their agreement.

Katherine's Three Children With Her Ex-Husband

Katherine has three beautiful children named Max Bosworth, Hayley Bosworth, and Chase Bosworth from her ex-spouse. [caption id="attachment_1901" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Katherine and Brian together with their kids[/caption] Like her father, Hayley Bosworth is a freshman defensive specialist on a Sooner volleyball team at The University of Oklahoma, in Norman, Oklahoma.

Has Katherine Nicastro Remarried After Divorce?

Since her divorce from her ex-partner, Katherine is somehow quite silent about her personal life. She has since never come out with her relationship status. So, it is quite hard to confirm whether or not Nicastro is married to anyone at present. On the other hand, her ex-spouse Brain is now married to a woman named Morgan Leslie Heuman. They exchanged their vows in 2012.

Net Worth of Katherine Nicastro

As per sources, her net worth is $1 million as of 2022. She mainly makes her fortune from her work as a realtor. Besides, her ex-spouse Brain's net worth is $8 million. He has made such a good amount of money from his sports and acting career.

title: Leah Weber
body:
Leah Weber, fully Leah Weber King is an American public figure, businesswoman, and broadcast journalist. But, Weber hit the media as the wife of businessman Dexter Scott King who is also an American civil rights activist. Like him, his parents Martin Luker King Jr and Coretta Scott King were also prominent civil rights leaders. Talking about their marriage, Leah and her hubby Dexter got married back in 2013 in a private wedding ceremony. They have been leading a happy married life ever since. Besides, do they have any children? Well, we will discuss every detail of Leah's professional and personal life including her parents, age, and more in the following article!

Early Life of Leah Weber

Leah Weber was born on August 7, 1980, in New Orleans, Louisiana, holding the zodiac sign Leo. As of 2022, Weber is 42 years old. She was born and brought up in her hometown of New Orleans in a mixed family. As for her nationality, Leah is an American and is of mixed ethnical background.

Who Are Her Parents?

Leah is the daughter of Larry Weber (father). However, the details about her mother are yet to be revealed. Apparently, there are also rumors that her biological father Larry is the Chairman & CEO of Racepoint Global. But, the guy who works at the company is totally different. People only speculated after Leah's father happened to have the same name as the guy who worked at Global company. Back in June 2016, Leah also posted a black and white photo with her father on the occasion of Father's Day. She wrote,
"I think a father's job when it's done best, is to get down on both knees, lean over his children's lives, and whisper, 'Where do you want to go?' And then, leaning over us, he whispers, 'Let's go do THAT together.'"
She added,
"Happy Father's Day, Dad!"
[caption id="attachment_2019" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Leah Weber with her father Larry Weber[/caption] Now moving toward her siblings, Weber has one sister named Lisa Weber Stafford and a brother too. Her sista Lisa went to the Academy of the Holy Angels. She later attended the University of New Orleans to study Business Management Techniques.

Leah Weber And Her Husband Dexter's Secret Marriage

Leah weber is currently married to Dexter Scott King. The couple tied the knot in a private ceremony Friday on July 5, 2013. Their hush-hush wedding ceremony was organized in California. [caption id="attachment_2020" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Leah weber with her Partner Dextor Scott King[/caption] After the two got hitched, Dexter's cousin Issac Newton Farris Jr. told Atlanta Journal, "Leah is a welcome addition to the family." He described the newlywed couple as "great friends." Farris further added, We’re looking forward to a very happy union. She fits in well with the family. Everybody in the family loves her.” Unfortunately, the matriarch of the King family, Christine King Farris (Dexter's aunt) couldn't be available at their ceremony due to some private reason. But, Christine said Dexter called her to reveal the happy news a day after their wedding, "He said, ‘Aunt Chris, I’ve finally taken the step. Leah and I are married’" She continued,
“I am real pleased that they have gotten together and I wish them all the best. His parents would be very pleased for him.”

How did Leah and Her Spouse Dexter meet?

Although both of them have remained tight-lipped about their initial romance, Dexter's cousin Issac said Leah and King met years ago while Weber was hosting a book signing for “Growing Up King: An Intimate Memoir” in New Orleans. The two wouldn't wait too much to start dating. Later on, Leah and her then-boyfriend Dexter also got engaged.

Who Is Leah's Husband Dexter Scott King?

As we already mentioned, her life partner Dexter is a staunch American civil rights activist. Born on January 30, 1961, in Atlanta, Georgia, Scott has also built quite a good career path in several other fields like acting, filmmaking, and writing. He appeared in the 1978 film King. And his TV credits include The Rosa Parks Story and Our Friend, Martin.

What Is Leah Weber Doing Now?

Leah is a businesswoman by profession. In addition to her business endeavors, Weber also worked as a broadcast journalist before. However, other details about her professional life are yet to be revealed. Not to forget, Weber only came into the limelight following her marriage with Dexter. At present, the celebrity spouse resides in Malibu, California with her husband and other family members.

Net Worth Of Leah

Weber has an estimated net worth of $500,000 in 2022. She mostly makes her money from her business works and other endeavors. On the other hand, her husband Dexter's fortune is $9 million.

Social Media Preference and Physical Appearance

Leah is active on every major social media platform like Instagram, Facebook, and Twitter. Judging by her social media posts, it looks like Dexter Scott King's wife is pretty into art and drawings. Besides, Leah is 5 feet 8 inches tall, i.e. 178 centimeters. She is approximately 57 kg or 129 lbs. And her body measurements are 32-29-38.

title: Evelien Smolders-Details on Her Boyfriend, First Husband, College
body:
Evelien Smolder is a popular dutch model, YouTuber, and Twitch Streamer. She is also known by her nickname "Gab Smolders." She holds over 341k followers on her Instagram and 280.7k followers on TikTok. The social media celebrity is remarkably known for her amazing videos on her official YouTube and Twitch platforms. She mostly makes horror posts on her YouTube channel. Aside from her multiple professions, people are also curious to know if Evelien Smolder is dating Jacksepticeye. Continue reading the article to know about their love life. Also, explore everything about her parents, rise to fame, past relationships, and net worth as well!

All About Eveline Smolder's Age and Parents

Smolders was born on September 11, 1988, in the Netherlands. As of 2022, she is 33 years of age. Smolder’s parents brought her up in the Quaint Town of the Netherland. [caption id="attachment_1729" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Youtuber GG Gab.[/caption] Talking about her parents, her father worked in construction and her mother used to work as an after-school educator. She grew up along with her three siblings; two sisters and one brother.

College: Evelien Is a master' Degree Holder

Moving into her school life, Eveline did her high school in her hometown. She later obtained her bachelor's degree. Following that, she went on to join Leiden University in the Netherlands for her Master's degree. Six years after there, Smolders also earned her Master's degree in Japanese. While at college, she also spent a couple of years in Japan in order to do field research into a family-oriented business

Her Car Accident

When Evelien Smolders was 17, she got involved in a minor car accident. Though some more damage could have happened at the time, she only broke her right collarbone. As a result, the social media star still has a little bump on her neck.

What Did Evelien Do Before Being A YouTuber?

After completing her master's degree, Evelien started to apply for a job and later joined the translation company in Amsterdam as a project manager in 2012. She used to work in a department that dealt with clients and outsourcing translations to translators. Along with handling clients, Smolders also helped to assure the quality of different languages like Japanese, Chinese, Mandarin, and Korean languages. At the same time, her boyfriend whom she was dating at the time also got a job in Japan. Later, she also decided to move with him to Japan and continued her job in Amsterdam through online.

Was Evelien Also in the Modelling?

The answer is yes. While Evelien was staying in Japan to complete her Masters's degree, she was also involved in modeling. At the time, Smolders did model for several makeup artists for their portfolio. [caption id="attachment_1730" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Gab also tried modeling[/caption] However, the work she was doing as a model made her so uncomfortable because of her big height. Due to her stature, clothes would barely fit her. She shares some words from her video related to modeling, “It was a fun but stressful experience, which was way out of my comfort zone.” That's why she left modeling and focused more on her youtube videos.

Evelien is a Youtuber and Twitch User

Evelien Smolders started her youtube channel named Gab Smolders back in 2014. So far, she has earned more than 839,000 subscribers on her channel. She mostly posts videos on her channel related to vlogging, some reaction videos and a few of them are also related to horror games. On the other hand, Smolders also has a Twitch channel which she created on December 1, 2014. She initially named her channel GirlGamerGab, but later on, changed it to Gab Smolders. It has thousand concurrent viewers as of 2022.

Is Evelien Smolders Still Dating Her YouTuber Boyfriend Jacksepticeye?

Twitch Streamer is currently dating her beau Jacksepticeye. Her boyfriend is an Irish YouTuber, best known for his vlogs and comedic Let's Play series. As of June 2022, his self-titled channel has over 28.6 million subscribers with 15.3 billion views so far. It is also the most subscribed Irish channel to date. [caption id="attachment_1731" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Evelien Smolders and her boyfriend[/caption] Although neither Evelien nor her partner talked about their first meeting, the duo made their relationship official through their respective Instagram accounts in March 2019. Since then, Evelien and her beau have frequently featured on their social media handles.

Her Boyfriend Jacksepticeye Shared A Sweet Message For His Gf GG Gab

As we have said earlier that the duo who are dating for a long time has also shared the same love for social media. And they often appear together on many of their youtube videos and social media profiles. They also shared their feelings for each other via their social media posts. Back in April 2019. Evelien Smolders' boyfriend shared a sweet message for his lover on his Twitter, mentioning her as "the best thing that happened to him." [caption id="attachment_1895" align="aligncenter" width="563"] GG gab's boyfriend posted for her[/caption] So, it is safe to say, both of them are pretty into each other.

Evelien Smolders' Divorce From Her Husband

Before her current boyfriend Jackspeticeve, the YouTuber was married to a guy named Pyke. However, both of them remained secretive about their failed marriage, leaving the details of their wedding and divorce behind closed doors. A little is known about her former husband is that Pyke was also a YouTuber. He is known by his nickname Taiyou Inc. Well, their relationship could not last for long, so the couple got separated because of some issues.

Social Media

This famed YouTuber is very active on various social media sites. Smolders is pretty active on TikTok and has a good number of followers which is 280.7k and her TikTok user name goes like this @toastygoobers. She is also active on Twitter and has 295.9k followers as of 2022. Furthermore, Smolders is also quite active on Instagram and Facebook with thousands of followers.

Evelien is Fond of Tattoos

Evelien is fond of tattoos, and there are a lot of questions from her fan asking related to her tattoos and their meanings. On the right underarm, she has a tattoo of the shadow of the colossus which was her first tattoo. [caption id="attachment_1732" align="aligncenter" width="450"] GG Gab is a tattoo lover[/caption] Being a video game lover, she has also many tattoos related to video games. And behind her ear, there is a small tattoo of a little music sign.

Net Worth of Evelien Smolders

This YouTuber is living a luxurious life with her family. She also owns some luxurious cars and modern electronic gadgets. As for her net worth, Smolders has an estimated net worth of $2 million. She mostly makes money from her various sources such as paid commercials, promotions, YouTube videos, and many more. She has also started her clothing line.

How Tall Is Gab Smolders?

Evelien stands at the height of 5 feet 11 inches or 180 centimeters. She weighs 65 kg (143 lbs). The beautiful YouTuber with blonde hair has dark brown on one eye and another eye color is light brown. She is among the people who are blessed with this type of different eye color called heterochromia.

Facts You Should Know About Eveline Smolders

  • In her younger days, Smolders loved to play the piano.
  • She is fluent in Japanese.
  • She does regular workouts to stay healthy and fit.
  • Eveline has heterochromia thus one of her eyes is dark brown, and the other one is light brown.

title: Curt Sandoval
body:
Curt Sandoval is a famed American weekend sports anchor and reporter. He gained popularity working for ABC7 Eyewitness News which he joined in 1999 as a sports reporter. Curt has been working as a reporter since his graduation. Apart from anchoring, Curt is previously an avid runner as he has competed in many marathons. He has finished numerous Ironman Triathlons. In addition, we are going to know the marriage life of the versatile anchor and reporter. Who is his wife? Does he share any children? Let's find out!

Curt Sandoval Wiki-Bio: How old is he?

He was born on 1st May 1964 in Denver, Colorado. Sandoval is white by ethnicity and he is of American nationality. According to his birthdate, his current age is 58. Sandoval presently resides in Santa Clarita, California, United States. Moving to his family, Curt is one of three sons between Irv Sandoval and his late wife. Curt's father sadly once suffered from throat cancer. He considers his father the most inspirational and motivational person in his life as his father fought cancer bravely. Unfortunately, his mother also passed away which only added to Curt's emotional pain. But, we got to know that, he has a step-mom with whom his dad is spending a beautiful love life. [caption id="attachment_1714" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Curt with his dad and stepmother.[/caption] Curt also has three siblings, two brothers, and one sister named Kim Phillips. The bonding between these three siblings is going beautiful. The Sandoval siblings spend always gather together for various occasions like Christmas.

Curt Sandoval's Education

Curt Sandoval completed his school life at Westminster High School from 1980 to 1982. Afterward, he enrolled at the Metropolitan State College where he got a degree in sports communication in 1987.

How does Curt Sandoval Start his TV Station career?

Sandoval began his TV station career serving on 7News as a sports anchor/reporter. He worked there from August 1990 to August 1995. Then, for four years from 1995 to 1999, he worked at KUSI TV in San Diego. He has also worked for over eight different TV stations up until his graduation. [caption id="attachment_1715" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Curt with his siblings, two brothers, and a sister.[/caption] After struggling a lot, Curt was finally able to join ABC7 Eyewitness News in 1999 where he works as a sports anchor. Subsequently, he won two Emmy Awards for his awesome performance on ABC7. Furthermore, Curt is not only an anchor and reporter but, he is an avid runner as well. He has participated in many marathons and also finished several Ironman Triathlons. Whereas he also raised $5,000 for the Challenged Athletes Foundation and completed the 140-mile endurance event. As well, Curt was nominated for Emmy for his three-part series on the California Ironman.

Curt Sandoval's Wife, Is The Couple Together Till Now?

Curt Sandoval is a happily married man as he tied the knot with his pretty wife Jeanne Zelasko on 13th June 1998. She is also a journalist and sportscaster. Curt shares a beautiful relationship with his wife. Sandoval shares a lot of pictures of his wife on his social media which shows how much he loves her. The lovebirds are currently enjoying more than two decades of togetherness. Given that they are still going strong without any controversy, we can say for sure they are less likely to separate in the future ahead.

Curt Sandoval's Children

From his two decades of marital relationship with Jeanne, Curt became a blessed father of two kids, a daughter, and a son. His daughter Isabel Sandoval, was born on August 10th, 2005. She is a talented individual just like her mom and dad. She is a cheerleader who was qualified for nationals with SCV All Stars! as well as she is the Universal Cheerleaders Association Division I-A College Champion. On the other hand, his son, Trevor was born on April 19th, 2002. Just like his daughter, Curt's son is also a talented individual. He is an Ice Hockey player and he plays for Shattuck-St. Mary's School. He was also offered an opportunity to attend Tahoe Prep Academy for school and hockey where he started his game in August 2018. [caption id="attachment_1716" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Curt with his wife and kids surfing around the beach.[/caption] Besides, Curt considers his wife a better mom. He once mentioned on his Facebook account that his wife even put her career on a hold in order to take care of their children.

Curt Sandoval Battle with Cancer

Back in October of 2014, Curt was identified with cancer as doctors found lymphoma in his throat. After the diagnosis, both his profession and personal life suffered. [caption id="attachment_1717" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Curt had a run-in with cancer.[/caption] However, Sandoval never gave up and fought cancer and eventually defeated it. As of now, he is cancer-free and living a healthy, fit, and fine life. Sadly, just like himself, Curt's wife Zelasko too was treated for thyroid cancer on 30th December 2007. Her circumstances were so much critical, as she had only a 1% chance of surviving the disease. Dan Bell, a Fox spokesman said; "She'll be out for as long as her treatment takes. We can't wait to have her back in her MLB studio chair in April." Like her husband Curt, she later returned to her work fighting against it.

Curt's Wife Jeanne Zelasko Worked For Fox Sports West

Talented woman, Jeanne Zelasko is a journalist and sportscaster. She is known for working for "The Beast" AM980 KFWB and Fox Sports West. She firstly did a job in metro traffic reports and hosted a talk show on KCEO radio. Firstly, she started her career in 1993 working at KDCI-TV News in San Diego. She was also a member of NASCAR on Fox where she worked as a pit reporter.

Curt Sandoval's Social Media

Curt Sandoval is also a social media user as well. He has gained more than 3.5K followers with 1,917 posts on his Instagram account and over 7K followers on his Twitter account. Sandoval posts about his day-to-day life on his social media accounts.

Curt Sandoval's Net Worth, Salary

Curt Sandoval is a successful man who has an approximated net worth of $2 million. He also earns a considerable amount of salary which is around $166,691 per year. He earns this salary by working for ABC7 Eyewitness News. Contrastingly, Curt's wife, Jeanne is also earning a fine amount of money as she has a net worth of about $2 million.

title: Ayesha Hauer
body:
Ayesha Hauer, a well-known Swiss actress, and model is the daughter of late actor Rutger Hauer. She is highly known for her outstanding acting in several movies, including Witchcraft V: Dance with the Devil (1997), Kick of Death (1997), and Welcome Says the Angel (1996). Aside from Ayesha's professional career, her personal life is also something to look into, as she is famous for her marriage to her ex-husband Thomas Jane. So, let's go through this article as we unravel various facts about Ayesha Hauer like- her personal life, parents, siblings, career, husband, net worth, and more.

Ayesha Hauer’ Early Life 

Ayesha is the daughter of Rutger Hauer and Heidi Merz, born on April 1, 1966, in Basel, Switzerland. Her zodiac sign is Aries. She belongs to the Dutch ethnicity and has Swiss citizenship. There is not much information on her early childhood days and academic qualifications, but we can assume that she got her degree from a good university.

Does Ayesha have any siblings?

Ayesha is the only child of Rutger Olesen Hauer and Heidi Merz.

Who are Ayesha Hauer's Parents?

She is the only child of the late great actor Rutger Oelsen Hauer and Heidi Merz. Her father was a famous Dutch actor. Along with acting, he was also an avid writer and an environmentalist.  He was born in Breukelen, Utrecht, the Netherlands, on January 23, 1944. His parents, Teunke Hauer and Arend Hauer were both actors and ran an acting school. [caption id="attachment_1698" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Ayesha's father is a legendary actor.[/caption] Rutger's acting career began with the Dutch television series Floris and continued with Turkish Delight (1973), which was hailed as the most fantastic Dutch movie of all time. Following his success in films like Soldier of Orange (1977) and Spetters, he was offered roles in American productions like Nighthawks (1981) and Blade Runner. Rutger is mainly known to his audience for his outstanding performance in Blade Runner. How did Rutger Hauer Die? Rutger passed away on July 19, 2019, at 75, owing to sickness, although the precise cause of death remains a mystery to date. The funeral was held in secret on July 24 of that same year.

Ayesha Hauer’ Career - How did she become an actress?

After graduating from high school, Ayesha started her career as a model and participated in many modeling projects. But as time passed, she began to show interest in acting. Well, who could blame her, looking at her family background?  She started her acting career with the movie "Witchcraft V: Dance with the devil as Anastasia" in 1993. Although she acted in various films, she is mainly known for working in the movie Kick-off death, where she played Alia, and also in the movie At Ground Zero. She also has a passion for acting like her father, a great actor, had done movies like Bladerunner and Nighthawks. Furthermore, she always enjoyed watching her father's movies and television shows when she was a child. It could have been the driving factor for her to be an actress.

Ayesha Hauer Married Life

Rutgers' daughter exchanged her vows with a famous Hollywood actor Thomas Jane. The couple had acted in many movies together, and their relationship grew soon after they married on December 15, 1989. [caption id="attachment_1696" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Ayesha with her ex-hubby, Thomas.[/caption]

Ayesha's Ex-husband, Thomas Jane. Who is he?

He was born in Baltimore, Maryland, in the United States on February 22, 1969. He is Michael Elliott and Cynthia's son. Thomas is a well-known American actor who has appeared in films including Deep Blue Sea (1998), The Thin Red Line (1998), and Boogie Nights (1997).

Reasons for the Couple to Part Ways

Even though the couple was living a happy life, their marriage ended after five years because of some personal problems and differences. Putting their matters aside, they worked in a couple of movies together even after their divorce.

Does the Ex-couple have any children together?

Yes, Rutgers daughter Ayesha and Thomas have a son named Leandro Maeder. He was born on December 14, 1987. It is not a surprise that Leandro also followed in his parents' footsteps. He is a model and an actor.  [caption id="attachment_1697" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Ayesha's son Leandro is a model.[/caption] Furthermore, As an actor, he has done movies like Eating Out 2: Sloppy Seconds (2006) and American High School (2009). He is a well-known model who has signed deals with agencies like Sight Management Studio Barcelona, London, d'management group Milan, Elite Toronto, and Success Model Paris.  Ayesha's son is estimated to have a net worth of $700,000.

Ayesha's Status after Divorce. Is she in a Relationship?

Ayesha has been quite secretive after the divorce from her then-husband Thomas Jane. But some sources say that she hasn't married and is single. Whereas, following their divorce, Thomas wed Patrica Arquette in 2006. Coincidentally, just like his relationship with Ayesha lasted for five years, the couple also filed for divorce after five years of being together in 2011. Additionally, he dated Natalie Zea in 2009 and Demi Moore in 2012. From 1998 to 2001, he engaged to Olivia d'Abo.

Hauer's Social Media Presence 

Ayesha is not active on any social media platforms and is entirely private about her personal life.

Ayesha Hauer's Physical Appearance and Hobbies 

She has blue-green eyes with blonde hair color, and her height is 5 feet 7 inches with a body weight of 59 kgs. Hauer is currently 56 years old. Meanwhile, she loves traveling and photography. Similarly, her favorite actor is Tom Cruise and her Actress is Jennifer Lawrence. She loves Italian foods, and her favorite destination is Miami.

How much is Ayesha Hauer' Net Worth?

Her net worth is estimated to be $4 million as of 2022. Most of her wealth came from her work as a model and actor. Additionally, she made money from sponsorships, ads, and brand collaborations. She furthermore got divorce and child support payments from her former husband, Thomas. Her late father, Rutger Hauer, was estimated to have a net worth of around $16 million.

title: Nurdian Cuaca
body:
Nurdian Cuaca is an Indonesian business tycoon having a multi-million dollar business empire. He is an entrepreneur with a large amount of investment in real estate, casinos, automobiles, and many more. Aside from his business empire, he rose into prominence for his ugly divorce case with his ex-wife Jamie Chua. Jamie is a former Chinese-Singaporean Airlines Stewardess with whom Nurdian marry in the late 80s. So, why Nurdian's divorce case was so famous? Has Nurdian Cuaca married a second wife? Let's find out the answer including some facts about his life.

Nurdian Cuaca's Early Life and Education

He was born in Jakarta on 12 October 1965 to an Indonesian family. He grew up in his birthplace Jakarta, the capital of Indonesia. Besides his birth information, there are no other details available about his early life as he stayed private about it. Concerning his education, he studied at Manila High school. Likewise, he graduated with a management degree. Also, sources say, he attended college at the University of Thailand. Besides, he belongs to the Javanese ethnicity and has an Indonesian Nationality.

Career Details: Nurdian is a Businessman by Profession

He is one of the most successful Indonesian entrepreneurs with multi-million dollars in his pocket. As per sources, he has expanded his business all over Asia. Similarly, he owned a real estate property in Hongkong and has several private investments. [caption id="attachment_1688" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Nurdian Cuaca in launching event. Source: WatchProSite[/caption] Apart from his real estate business and investments, he had invested in a shoe business named "Cloud 9 Lifestyle," but the company was closed in 2011.

When did Nurdian Cuaca get married to his ex-wife Jamie Chua? Their First Meeting 

Nurdian and Jamie, for the first time, met on an International flight. At the time, his ex-wife was a flight attendant on Chinese-Singaporean Airlines and was serving in a business-class cabin. The pair apparently met when Nurdian too was traveling on the same airlines as Jamie. After meeting for the first time, the couple was instantly smitten with each other and remained in touch. Gradually with more meetings, their relationship started making sense and after dating for some time, they tied the knot in the late 80s. While they were in a marital relationship, Nurdian was an employee in a company. In some interviews, Jamie disclosed that they struggled initially to become financially stable. It took ten years for the newlywed couple to be in the position they are today. [caption id="attachment_1673" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Nurdian Cuaca with his ex-wife Jamie.[/caption] They were married for fifteen years.

Nurdian Cauca is the father of two children with his ex-spouse

Talking about his children, he shares one son named Cleveland Cuaca and a daughter named Calista Cuaca with his ex-wife Jamie. [caption id="attachment_1674" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Nurdian Cuaca's ex-wife and children. Source: Biography Mask[/caption] Cleveland was born on February 20, 1995. He is a socialite and online personality. He has 64.8K followers on his Instagram account with the username @zoned20out. Additionally, he is a Kart-racer and came in 3rd position in his first-ever race. Likewise, he is also into dirt-biking. On the other hand, Calista, Nurdian's daughter, was born on December 20, 1998. She is also a Singaporean social media influencer with 310k followers on her Instagram account 'xcalikins'. Similarly, she is a Jewelry designer and she began her jewelry business with the name IAMLIMITEDITION in 2019 in cooperation with her friend named Dyon Foo.

Who is Nurdian Cuaca' Ex-wife Jamie Chua?

She is a famous online personality with millions of followers on her Instagram account. Likewise, she is a YouTuber having more than 540K subscribers on her Youtube channel. Also, she is a famous Tiktoker with 250K followers on her TikTok account. [caption id="attachment_1687" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Nurdian Cuaca's ex-wife Jamie chua. Source: Biography Mask[/caption] Besides her influence on social media sites, she is the known face of the International Fashion forum like Paris Fashion Week from which we can say that she is also an international model. She is a fashion star who got an award for best-dressed attendees in 2019 at the fashionable social gathering ICON Ball. Before stepping into the world of fashion, Jamie was a flight attendant on Chinese-Singaporean Airlines for three years. But, after her marriage to Nurdian, her career as a flight attendant came to an end.

Jamie Chua filed for divorce against Nurdian: What could be the reason?

In February of 2010, Jamie filed for divorce against her then-husband Nurdian citing 'Unreasonable Behavior'. Their divorce case continued for one year with an ongoing ugly fight between them and fraud cases filed against Cuaca. [caption id="attachment_1689" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Nurdian Cuaca and Jamie Chua's separation. Source: Dreshare[/caption] Nevertheless, after months of battle, the court finally approved their divorce in February 2011.

Nurdian Cuaca' most popular and controversial Divorce case

He covered international headlines after his wife filed for a divorce from him. His divorce case dragged the International media because of his ex-wife's unbelievable demand of $450,00 as a Monthly Alimony Payment for her maintenance. Likewise, his divorce became controversial after his former partner accused him of hiding assets worth $93 million which she eventually got hold of.  Meanwhile, due to this accusation, he fell under the investigation of Interpol, the international criminal police organization, for the fraud case.

Is Nurdian Cuaca married? Who is his wife?

The former celebrity spouse likes to live a life behind closed doors ever since his divorce from Jamie. This is why there's a lot of curiosity if he is married a second time or not. Well, it looks like he is not in a marital relationship with anyone as of now.

Nurdian Cuaca' Net Worth

He has a net worth of $50 million approximately. He earns the major portion of his income through his several private investments in addition to real estate business all over Asia. During his divorce procedure, he owned real estate in Hongkong worth more than $15 million and had a private investment of $80 million. Apart from his business, he owns a million-dollar house in Hongkong and has a great collection of exotic cars including a Ferrari, a Lamborghini, and a Porsche.

title: Who is Andrew Shingange? All About Trevor Noah's Brother
body:
Andrew Shingange is the half-brother of the popular talk show host and comedian, Trevor Noah. He also has a biological brother named Isaac Shingange from his parents' marriage. Talking about his childhood, Andrew, had to face a lot of physical and mental abuse by his father. In fact, there were quite a lot of legal dramas in his family because his dad was truly a criminal type. Let's find out are Andrew's father and mother still married? Did you know Andrew’s dad once shoot his mother in her head? Well, here are all the answers to your questions. In the article below, we will talk about his siblings, net worth, and more!

Andrew Shingange Full Bio: His Early Details and Ethnicity

Andrew was born in Johannesburg, South Africa. While his exact date of birth is yet to be revealed, Shingange was born in the 1980s. At that time, Africa was under Apartheid rule, a rule of White people upon Black people. [caption id="attachment_1597" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Andrew is the half-brother of comedian Trevor Noah.[/caption] Talking about his nationality, the celebrity sibling is an African and has a mixed ethnical background. His mother Patricia Nombuyiselo Noah who is Xhosa belongs to Nguni ethnic group.

Andrew Shingange's Father Was Abusive: His Mother's Previous Interracial Marriage

Andrew is the son of Ngisaveni Abel Shingange (father) and Patricia Nombuyiselo (mother). Patricia was previously married to her ex-spouse Robert Noah who was of Swiss-German ancestry. In fact, Robert’s relationship with Andrew’s mother Patricia was illegal as no other race was allowed to have intimate relations. As a result, they had to face a lot of criticism and harassment every day. At the time, the family was often attacked by fellow Africans. After some time, his mother Patricia went on to marry her second husband Ngisaveni. However, Abel was an abusive man and was involved in domestic violence. The old man even abused Andrew and his brother mentally and physically. Eventually, the abuse was too much for the family, and Patricia decided to start a new life with her children. So, Andrew's dad and mom legally separated in 1996. Following their divorce, Nombuyiselo got married to Sfiso Khoza.  

Andrew Shingange’s Mother Patricia was Shot In The Head By His Father

Patricia, after marrying Sfiso was living her life in peace. Nevertheless, one day in the early morning, when Patricia and Andrew were returning from church, they came across a drunk man who was actually Andrew's dad Abel. As soon as they saw each other, Abel said that Patricia ruined his life. While both parties were in an argument, Abel pulled out a gun and came toward his ex-wife and tried to shoot her but his gun couldn't trigger as it was jammed. Following the attempt, Patricia pushed her ex-spouse and ran toward her car. But, Abel again followed Patricia and shot her and the bullet went through her head and neck and embedded in her shoulder. She was immediately taken to the hospital in the United Kingdom by her son Andrew. After that, Abel was charged with an attempt to murder and went to jail. But, after 3 years, Abel was released on bail.

His Education

He attended Sandringham High School and then went on to enroll at Damelin Eden High School Randburg, followed by Sandringham High School.

Andrew Shingange’s Siblings

He has a biological sibling named Isaac Shingange. In addition, Andrew also has a half-brother named Trevor Noah from his mother's relationship with his ex-husband Robert Noah. Trevor Noah is one of the top comedians and well-known artists all over the world.

Shingange’s Half-Brother Trevor Noah

Trevor was born on 20th February 1984, in Johannesburg, South Africa. As we mentioned above, Trevor’s father and mother's relationship was illegal at the time of his birth. South Africa was at its peak of racism and as per the rule in Africa, being born by a mixed-raced was not accepted which even made Trevor’s birth invalid. Talking about his career, Trevor became the first African stand-up comedian to appear on The Tonight Show. Trevor is also a writer who published a book named Born a Crime. Furthermore, Trevor is the host of The Daily Show with Trevor Noah which is one of the top-rated shows with an 8.3 IMDb rating with millions of viewers all over the world.
 
View this post on Instagram
 

A post shared by Trevor Noah (@trevornoah)

The veteran comedian also has a strong social media presence and has a huge fan following of 75 million followers on his Instagram.

Andrew’s Step-Father Robert Noah

His step-dad Noah is a popular businessman, chef, and media personality. Moreover, Robert is famous as the father of renowned comedian, Trevor Noah. He currently resides in the USA with his son Trevor. He is around 83 or 84 years old by now.

Is Andrew Shingange Married? If Yes, Who is His Wife?

Andrew is married and is living with his wife in Gauteng, South Africa. The information about his marriage detail is yet to be revealed but sources say they are well settled and married happily. Looking at his social media, Andrew is also the father of one kid with his mysterious wife. At present, the celebrity sibling resides in Johannesburg, Gauteng with his family.

Andrew Shingange’s Net worth

According to many reports, his net worth by 2022 is $500,000. Talking about his half-brother, Trevor who has a wonderful career as a TV show host and stand-up comedian has an estimated net worth of around $150 million in 2022.

title: The Untold Facts About LaTaya Varner, Seimone Augustus' Ex-Wife
body:
LaTaya Varner is an actress and a model by profession. But, LaTaya who is a lesbian is more popular among people as the ex-partner of former American professional basketball player Seimone Augustus. His ex-life partner Seimone is four times champion of the Women’s National Basketball Association aka ‘WNBA’ and a three-time gold medalist in the Olympics. Since they were a lesbian couple, things were a little bit complicated for them to cope it in the public. So, they always raised their voice for LGBT rights. As for their marriage, the two married for three years before their divorce in 2018. Who is LaTaya dating after her separation? Here is everything about her from her date of birth to her current whereabouts. Let's check it all out!

Who is LaTaya Varner? Her Birth Details  

LaTaya Varner is an aspiring actress with a few acting credits under her belt. She was born on 9th, June 1990, in Saint Paul, Minnesota. And as of 2022, her age is 32. While there isn't more about her family, her mother is Native American and Hawaiian. Talking about her nationality, Varner is American and has a mixed ethnical background. As for her education, Varner graduated from the University of Minnesota.

Lataya Varner Relationship With Seimone Augustus 

The full detail about LaTaya and her partner Seimone's relationship hasn’t flashed out but according to LaTaya, they both met in Minneapolis for the first time and were in a relationship for a long period of time. In the year 2010, Lataya's then-girlfriend Seimone proposed to her in Miami Beach with a diamond ring.

LaTaya and Her Partner Augustus Wed in Hawaii

It took five years to get hitched for the couple since their engagement. Varner and a basketball superstar exchanged their vows in Hawaii in 2015. As per reports, the two had initially had a plan to marry in Minnesota but they had to relocate their wedding venue because lesbian marriage wasn't allowed in the city. [caption id="attachment_1546" align="aligncenter" width="450"] LaTaya and her ex-wife Seimone.[/caption] The couple was joined by 15 guests at their intimate wedding. They had a hula performance during dinner and a fire-and-knife show during dessert. Talking more about their big event, the two organized their outdoor event at the Montage Kapalua Bay resort in Maui. At the time, the newlywed duo used to split their time in Minneapolis and Moscow.

Is LaTaya Varner and Seimone Augustus Still Married? 

However, Lataya and Seimone are no longer together. They both got separated in the year 2018, about three years after their marriage. But, the reason behind their separation is still not revealed to the media.

Her Current Relationship Status

Following her divorce from her ex-spouse, LaTaya has been in a beautiful relationship with her other lesbian partner Latesha Buck. Sources say, the two began dating back in the early 2020s and are still together. Varner has posted a number of photos of them together on her Instagram profile. In one of her posts, the promising actress wrote, "she is in a healthy relationship."

Are LaTaya and Her New Partner Latesha Married?

After dating for a year, Varner and Buck married in a secret wedding venue. Unfortunately, details about how they met and where they got married are still behind the curtain. On the occasion of Valentine's Day 2022, LaTaya Varner's wife posted a beautiful photo of the duo on Twitter with the caption, "The sweetest thing I’ve ever known.. @LaTayaVarner happy Valentine’s Day to my wife, my love, my one." [caption id="attachment_1548" align="aligncenter" width="450"] LaTaya and her new partner.[/caption] So, it is safe to say, they are legally married and leading a happy matrimonial relationship together.

LaTaya Is Expecting A Child With Her New Wife  

Varner didn't have a child from her marriage with Seimone. But, the lady is going to be the mother of the kid soon with her new partner. Both the duo announced they were expecting their first child in Jan via their Instagram post. They revealed the gender of their baby as a boy with also mentioning the due date of their child as 22nd July 2022. Furthermore, LaTaya's partner wrote the baby was conceived via IVF. She wrote, "Our IVF journey has been nothing short of amazing. Going through this process with my soulmate brings me to tears."
 
View this post on Instagram
 

A post shared by Latesha Buck (@lateshabuck_)

Interesting Facts About Seimone Augustus, LaTaya’s Ex-Husband!

Augustus is an ex-member of the U.S. women's basketball team who won three gold medals in the Olympics. She played her school basketball at Capital High School in Baton Rouge, Louisiana. She later also performed in the 2002 WBCA High School All-America Game. For her college basketball, Seimone went to Louisiana State University. Besides, in April 2010, Lataya’s ex-partner underwent surgery at Fairview Southdale Hospital to remove fibroids. 

What LaTaya Do For a Living? Her Net Worth

LaTaya is an actress and a model. As for her net worth, Varner has a net worth of $1 million. On the other hand, her ex-wife Seimone has a fortune of $2.5 million. She mainly makes money from her basketball career.

Social Media Accounts of LaTaya Varner

LaTaya is active on social media on Facebook and Twitter with a good following. She also has an Instagram account with over 4k followers as of 2022. She mostly shared photos of herself and with her new partner on her Insta.

title: Kristen Zang
body:
Kristen Zang is an American actress, model, and Businesswoman. She is famous for her movies like Opposite Day and Hollywood. Not only in the movies but she has been featured in different ad campaigns and magazines. Besides her acting career, she gained full media coverage during her romantic relationship with actor Leonardo DiCaprio. Moreover, Zang is also an animal lover. She owns a company named Emma's Lou's Homemade Kitchen which specializes in dog nutrition. Today, this article intends to explore the personal and professional life of Kristen Zang. Where is she today? Is she single or what? Let's get to know more about her.

Kristen Zang' Early life

She was born on June 22, 1974, in Battle Creek, Michigan USA. Her birth name is Kristen Erica Zang. She is the daughter of Vernon, a manager of the Michigan Department of State Police, and Katherine Zang, a pediatrician. Tragically, her mother Katherine passed away in August 2021. Besides, the 48 years old actress is Caucasian and has American nationality. [caption id="attachment_1639" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Kristen Zang with her mother Kathy.[/caption] Regarding her education, she did her high school at Royal Oak Kimball High School in Michigan. Right after completing high school, at the age of 17, she ran away from her home to pursue a career in the glamorous field. She moved to Los Angeles and then started modeling with Elite Models (a chain modeling agency).

Kristen Zang's Siblings

She has two siblings with whom she grew up, Tara Winans, and Michael Zang.

Kristen Zang's Modelling and Acting Career

Professionally, she began modeling with Elite Models. Gradually, Zang made her presence in the TV series 'Dharma and Greg' in the episode named The Dutch Treat as Victoria's Secret model. Further, Warner Bros, a film production company, featured her in the catalog that got printed later. Subsequently, she made her debut in the movie named, All My Friends are Cowboys in 1998. In this particular movie, she played the role of Jenny. Likewise, Kristen made an appearance as 'Savannah' in her next movie Love and Sex in 2000. Similarly, she made her presence in other movies like Opposite Day, Raw Deal, Hollywood, and many more.

Kristen Zang is an owner and the Founder of a Company

She has her own company named Emma Lou's Homemade Kitchen, established in January 2008. It is located in Beverly Hills, California. The company has its branch in Eugene, Oregon. She formed the company in order to offer high-quality homemade food for the animals (especially dogs). Except for the owner and founder, Zang is also the head chef for the company. Furthermore, she often visits dog rescue programs. In the same way, she prefers to involve in charity work in Los Angeles.

How did Kristen Zang think of starting a Company? 

She had an adopted puppy named Emma, who later was diagnosed with distemper, a contagious disease caused by contaminated food. She wanted to save Emma and subsequently started learning about the nutrition required for dogs. Her attempt to learn about nutrition was, at the time, just to save Emma. Despite her effort, her adopted dog Emma died of distemper and later her knowledge of nutrition worked for a big cause. She subsequently founded a company to offer human-grade delicacies to animals especially dogs, to keep them far from consuming poor-quality food. She named her company after her late dog Emma. Today, Zang, as a head chef of the company, is using her culinary skill and her wide knowledge of nutrition to provide human-grade food for dogs. Side by side, she often walks out for a dog rescue program.

Kristen Zang's High Profile Relationships 

Speaking about her relationship, she has shared a romantic relationship with the famous actors of Hollywood, Nicolas Cage and Leonardo DiCaprio. Let's talk in detail about her high-profile relationship.

Relationship with Ghost Rider actor Nicolas Cage

In the year 1992, she started dating the Ghost Rider actor Nicolas Cage. At the time, she was a teenager and was a swimsuit model. Though we don't know how the couple first met, we can assume they might've come across each other while working in the entertainment industry. Soon, Cage decided to take their relationship to the next level and subsequently proposed to Zang. At the time of their engagement, Nicholas was 28 while Zang was 19. But slowly and gradually, some differences started appearing in their relationship. According to some sources, even after they were planning to settle down, Nicolas was acting like a single guy and used to avoid her calls. As a result, they both decided to go their separate ways in December 1994.

Relationship with the Titanic actor Leonardo DiCaprio

After her break-up with Nicholas, Kristen started dating Titanic actor Leonardo DiCaprio in the year 1995. Initially, they were in a private relationship but officially came out in public as a couple on 24, October 1996 during the premiere of 'Romeo and Juliet' at the Mann Chinese Theatre in Los Angeles. The former flames were in deep love. Leo, who is known for having many girlfriends, said, 'It was love at first sight with Kristen'. What's more, in the year 1997, he moved out of his mother's home to settle down with his then-gf Zang. Safe to say, she was Leonardo's first-ever long-term girlfriend. [caption id="attachment_1638" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Kristen and Leonardo attended Romeo and Juliet premiere.[/caption] Nevertheless, their relationship was filled with lots of trouble due to Leo's constant sighting of different women. Consequently, their relationship started falling apart. Hereafter, they were never seen with each other. On their break-up, a source close to Kristen said,
She broke up with Leonardo because of not wanting to deal with the hassle of dating a famous actor.

Rumor on Kristen Zang's Rumored Relationship

Sources say she dated Leonardo DiCaprio's stepbrother Adam Farrar. Also, there was a rumor that due to Adam and Kristen's relationship, there was a coldness between the brothers. Further, there was gossip about her short relationship with the Broadway actor Constantine Maroulis. Likewise, there are reports of her dating NXS singer Michael Hutchence, an Australian Musician.

Kristen Zang' Marital Status

Talking about her current relationship status, she is a married woman. She tied the knot with Shea Dale on March 15th, 2014. Her husband is in the construction business and is the owner of Shea-Built Construction. Further, her spouse does remodeling and new construction in the Eugene area. [caption id="attachment_1676" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Kristen Zang with her husband. Source: Her husband's Insta account[/caption] There is not much information about how their relationship began, considering Kristen lives a life behind closed doors. Regardless, their relationship is going pretty well and given they are married since 2014, we can say they the lovebirds started dating several years ago. Now, both of them are quite private when it comes to their personal life still, they have shared a handful of photos with each other on their respective social media account. Kristen's husband once shared a romantic picture of the two, commemorating their fourth wedding anniversary. [caption id="attachment_1679" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Kristen's husband commemorates their fourth wedding anniversary.[/caption] As of 2022, they are enjoying their eighth year together as a couple.

Does Kristen Zang share any kids?

This is probably one of the most asked questions about Kristen. The fact that she is in a marital relationship for almost a decade, there is bound to be curious if she has welcomed a child or not. Well, due to Kristen's private nature, she has not revealed if she is a mother of not.

Where is Kristen Zang living today?

Currently, she is residing in Los Angeles, California.

Kristen Zang's Social Media Presence

She is on Facebook and Instagram. She has a Facebook account, where she is pretty much active in showing her personal and professional life. What's more, she also operates her company, Emma Lou's Kitchen's Instagram account.

Kristen Zang's Net Worth

She has a net worth is $500,000 as she accumulates a large amount of money from her own company which lies in two different states Oregon, and California. Besides, Zang also earned money from her modeling and acting work.

Quick Facts

Name: Kristen Zang Profession: Actress, Owner, and founder of company Emma Lou's Homemade Kitchen Hair Color: Light Brown Eye color: Grey Height: 5 feet 10 inch Zodiac Sign: Cancer Nationality: American
