title: Chris Rodstrom
body:
Chris Rodstrom is the wife of a popular sports personality, Pat Riley. Chris became notable after marrying one of the most celebrated basketball players of all time ‘Riley’ in 1970. He is not just an American former basketball player but also a head coach, and NBA executive by profession. Talking about Chris, she used to work as a trained and licensed family therapist. But, later she left her job to join her husband Pat as his assistant. Here today let's talk in-depth about Chris Rodstrom and find out what is she doing nowadays? Moreover, we will talk more about Chris and her relationship with Pat. Likewise, this article intends to explore her education, children, and her personal life.

Chris Rodstrom's Early Life and Education

Chris was born to her parents in 1951, in Maryland USA. She belongs to the Caucasian ethnicity and has American nationality. Regarding her early life, there is not much information available, though some of the reports say, her father was a Navy captain and her mother, was a Navy nurse. Accordingly, in Chris' educational background, she did her high school graduation from Helix High School, in La Mesa, California in 1966. Likewise, Rodstrom completed her BA in 1972. After that, she attended Cal State University and successfully completed her master's degree in Psychology.

How old is Chris today?

As of 2022, Chris is 71 years old.

Age Gap between Chris and her husband

Chris and Pat have 6 years of age gap.

Chris Rodstrom's relationship with Pat Riley: How did it begin?

Rodstrom and Riley for the first time met in the late 1960s. At that time, Pat was playing for San Diego Rocket and Rodstrom was a student at the University of San Diego. [caption id="attachment_1528" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Chris Rodstrom with her husband. Source: Pinterest[/caption] After they met, slowly and gradually their love blossomed in San Diego. As per reports, for their first date, the lovebirds went to San Diego Boxing club in 1968. They were there to watch a boxing match. After two years of dating each other finally, they tied the knot on 26th June of 1970.

Chris's husband, Pat Riley is a legendary NBA player

On March 20, 1945, Pat Riley (aka Patrick James Riley) was born to Mary Rosalia and Leon Riley. He started his career as a basketball player when he was in high school. Afterward, Pat joined the National Basketball Association (NBA) where he played the position of Shooting Guard. As a player, he was involved with the teams like San Diego Rockets, Los Angeles Lakers, and Phoenix Suns.  In addition to his career, he also worked as a coach for the teams like Los Angeles Lakers, New York Knicks, and Miami Heat. As a coach, he first started as an assistant for Los Angeles Lakers in 1979, and later become a head coach for the same team. Further, he also became head coach for other teams as well. Additionally, as a head coach, he has won the NBA championship five times. His achievement doesn't stop here. He, further, became the president of the Miami Heat in 1995 and also gain the position of executive coach in 2012. As a result, Riley, successfully, won multiple awards as a player, coach, and NBA executive which helped him to establish himself in the sports world.

How is the relationship going between Chris Rodstrom with her husband, Pat Riley?

Chris is in a beautiful and blissful relationship with Pat since 1970. As of 2022, they are in their fifty-second years of married life and still sharing a beautiful bond. In their five decades of married life, they both stood by each other's side through thick and thin. With the growing sweetness in the relationship, both Chris and Pat wish to live their remaining life with each other. [caption id="attachment_1529" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Chris Rodstrom with husband Pat posing for media.[/caption] In like manner, Pat has a dream to play the guitar for the lady of his life, Chris. As per the sources, Pat has a great collection of guitars. He wants to learn to play guitar so that he can play 'My Girl' for his wife one day.

How many children does Chris Rodstrom have?

Altogether, Chris has two children, a daughter, and a son. She has a daughter named Elisabeth Riley, who was born in 1989 as per the report of ESPN, a Global TV Network. Likewise, Chris has a son named James Riley. Chris' both children are away from the limelight due to which there is not much detail available regarding their personal life.

Chris Rodstrom's Career

As mentioned above, Chris was a student of Psychology. She is a trained therapist and afterward, she even took a license and started her career as a therapist. But that just lasted for a while. As after her marriage, Chris left her job to help her husband Pat in his coaching career.

Why did Chris give up her career and join her husband?

Chris never revealed the exact reason behind giving up her career as a therapist. But is crystal clear that, she left a therapist job to join her husband in his sports world. As per reports, she started getting spotted in the corner, celebrating whenever her spouse's team won.

Is Chris active on social media?

Even though Chris is a celebrity wife, she is not active on any social media sites.

How much is Chris Rodstrom' Net Worth?

An analysis of Chris' net worth is not done yet, as Chris is not open about it. But, as long as she is sharing her life with her husband Pat personally and professionally, she need not prioritize her personal net worth. However, Her husband Pat's net worth is around $80 million.

title: Who is Kelly Cobiella? All About Her Personal and Professional Life
body:
Kelly Cobiella is an American media personality and reporter. Kelly began her journalism career at Grand Junction, Colorado. She later worked on various news channels including KJCT TV, CBS News, and NBC News. Cobiella came into the limelight after the reporter covered a racist News about Prince Charles while working as a London correspondent for CBS News. Let's find out what the controversy was all about?   Well, while her professional life is quite open in the media, what about her personal life? Is Kelly married to anyone? Let’s find out everything about her in the following article! 

Kelly Cobiella Early Life and Education

Cobiella was born in 1973, in Frankfurt Germany. However, the information about her early life including her parents and sibling are still missing. She did her schooling in Frankfurt. After completing high school, Kelly moved to America with her parents and joined the University of Wisconsin-Madison in 1989. And the journalist graduated from the college with a Bachelor of Art (BA) degree in International Relations and Affairs in 1993.  Besides, talking about her ethnicity, Cobiella is Caucasian and belongs to British nationality.

How Did Kelly Start Her Journalism Career?

Kelly Cobielle, after completing her graduation started working as an anchor for KJCT TV. She later became a weather forecasting reporter at the channel. Soon, Kelly started working on CBS News, one of the renowned News Channels in the US. [caption id="attachment_1504" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Kelly with her team members.[/caption] After working as a reporter for CBS News, Cobielle got an opportunity to be a correspondent in London for CBS News Path in 2003. Over the years, Cobielle has covered many top stories which include Haiti Earthquake, the Afghanistan war, Post Iraq Invasion, BP Oil Spill, and many more.

What is Cobielle Doing At Present? Her Other Works 

Cobiella is one of the hard-working on-air personalities. She has worked as a reporter and writer in several high-profile cities including New York, Miami, Dallas, and various other parts of the US. Her journey from being an anchor on a local TV channel to a world-class reporter has been fascinating and a source of inspiration to several promising media personalities. As of 2022, Kelly works on NBC as a London correspondent. Furthermore, the reporter has also worked on many programs such as Good Morning America, ABCnews.com, World News Tonight, and many more. Apart from being a TV host, Cobielle is also known to be a producer and a yoga instructor. 

Her Achievements

Kelly won Emmy Awards in 2010 for outstanding Economic and Business Reporting while working with NBC news. Additionally, the journalist also got two Emmy Award nominations for her outstanding coverage of Newscasts in 2016 and 2017 respectively.

Allegation Against Kelly Cobiella

In 2021, it is believed that Kelly passed a racist comment on Prince Charles’s state of affairs. However, there isn’t any strong evidence to support what was exact comment but this incident later began to circulate among huge masses. As a result, Cobiella even had to face lots of problems.  In fact, Kelly is known for bringing the truth in front of an audience and has never been unfair or unpleasant in her job so, this might be the case of some misunderstanding.

Is Kelly Cobielle Married? Her Ultra-Secret Love Life

Yes, the 46-year-old American journalist Kelly has been married to an Englishman for several years. She has also mentioned herself as married on her Facebook profile. Nevertheless, the details about Kelly Cobielle's husband are yet to be revealed.  [caption id="attachment_1505" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Kelly is married to an unknown guy for a long.[/caption] Sources say the couple got married in April 2011 and the wedding took place privately with family members and limited friends. She also shares a son with her spouse. 

Where Does Cobielle Reside? Her Social Media Presence

Kelly lives in London, England with her husband and a son. Even though the media personality has kept her personal life secret, Kelly is active on social media handles like Facebook and Twitter with thousands of followers.  Mostly, Cobielle posts about herself on her social media profiles.

Kelly Cobiella’s Net Worth

Kelly is one of the well-renowned Journalists all over the world. And her estimated net worth is $1.5 million as of 2022. Needless to mention, her major source of income is her journalism career. Talking about her salary, she makes around $66,000-$70000 per annum.

title: Cassandra Marino
body:
Cassandra Marino is a star kid and an interior designer. She is popular as the eldest daughter of celebrity Caitlyn Jenner, a transwoman. Cassandra's mother is famous for the show ‘Keep Up with the  Kardashians', which is a family reality show. The show talks about the personal and professional life of the Jenner-Kardashian family ties. Today, this article intends to come up with more information about the famous Caitlyn's elusive daughter Cassandra Marino. Let's know about her personal life including her husband, siblings, and children.

Cassandra Marino’ Early Life and Her parents

She was born to Bruce Jenner and Chrystie Scott on June 10, 1980. Her nickname is Casey. She spent her childhood in Los Angeles, California USA. Talking about Casey’s parents, her father Bruce now Caitlyn is a retired sports athlete. He got fame after winning the Olympic decathlon gold medal and was renowned as ‘an all-American hero’.  However, Bruce now is currently identified with the name Caitlyn Jenner after he changed his gender in 2015.  Likewise, Cassandra’s mother Chrystie Scott, also known as Chrystie Annie Crownover or Chrystie Jenner, is an American former actress, best known for her movie SST: Death Flight in 1977. Also, she appeared in the Mike Douglas show in 1961. 

How old is Cassandra Marino now?

Cassandra is 42 years old.

Cassandra Marino' siblings

Altogether, she has five siblings from her father's three marriages. She has one biological brother named Burt Jenner who was born on September 6, 1978. Burton is an American Businessman who owns West LA Dogs, a Big Dog Building. He is also a professional off-road racing driver. [caption id="attachment_1496" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Cassandra with her half-siblings and step-siblings.[/caption] Moreover, Cassandra has four half-siblings. From her dad's second marriage with Linda Thompson, she has two half brothers named Brandon Jenner and Brody Jenner, with whom she shares an adorable relationship. Brandon was born on June 4, 1981. By profession, he is an American musician, singer, songwriter, and TV personality. In the same manner, Brody came into this world on August 21, 1983, and is also a TV personality today. Brody even works as a model and Disc Jockey. In addition, from her daddy's third marriage with Kris Kardashian, she has two half-sisters named Kendall and Kylie Jenner. Kendall is an American model, socialite, and media personality who was born on November 3, 1995.  Likewise, Kylie was born on August 10, 1997, she is also the founder and owner of the cosmetic company named, Kylie cosmetics. Besides, her father's third wife Kris has four children from her previous marriage. In respect to it, Casey has four step-siblings named Kourtney, Khloe, Rob, and Kim Kardashian.

Cassandra Marino’s parents' relationship

Her parents tied the knot on December 16, 1972. They had a blissful relationship and used to be considered a golden couple in the American sports world. By the time when Bruce won an Olympic game, Chrystie was by his side, standing as a strong supporter. But suddenly, their marriage started falling apart. Chrystie in her interview with People says,
Bruce was the first to admit it. He’d say, “I am treating you terribly and I don’t know why.” So that was when we decided to live apart.
As a result, in 1981, both of Cassandra's parents parted ways. And later, Chrystie Scott marries Robert Scott.

Cassandra's father Caitlyn and Gender Identity issue

As per sources, Caitlyn, struggled with her identity issue throughout her life. It was her deep secret, which she later opened up in front of her first wife Chrystie. She, in an interview with Good Morning America's George Stephanopoulos Monday, said
"He told me he wanted to be a woman, and understandably, I didn't know what to say,"
Later, in 2015, Caitlyn finally came forward as a transwoman and accepted her true identity.

How is Cassandra Marino' relationship with Caitlyn?

Today, she shares a good relationship with her mother. In an interview with PEOPLE in 2016, She said,
“My relationship with Caitlyn is much better than with the Bruce”.
Casey further added,
"We didn't talk for years, and now we see each other every couple of weeks and talk on the phone, which I am grateful for."
They keep sharing photos of chilling and enjoying themselves on their social media sites (Instagram). However, Cassandra Marino felt the lack of a father figure during her childhood. The father-daughter had a complex relationship, which Cassandra mentioned in one exclusive interview with Diane Sawyer. She said, “We have a very complex relationship. He disappeared out of our lives, especially out of my life”.
 
View this post on Instagram
 

A post shared by Caitlyn Jenner (@caitlynjenner)

But now both of them are on excellent terms with each other. Many times Cassandra is spotted on her mother's social media handle.

Who is Cassandra Marino' Husband?

Cassandra married privately to her long-term boyfriend Michael Marino. Besides that, there is no more information regarding the date of their marriages and the venue. Michael as of now works as a partner at Aurora Capital Partners. Likewise, he is also a partner to CEOs and Institutional Investors. Additionally, he is on a board of directors in Enhance Technology, Amino, and NTS-National Technical System.

How many children does Cassandra Marino have? 

In total, Cassandra shares three children with her husband Michael Marino. [caption id="attachment_1495" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Cassandra with her family, Source: News Unzip[/caption] She has two daughters named Francesca Marino and Isabella Marino. Francesca, Cassandra's eldest daughter was born in 2009. Likewise, Isabella Marino was born on January 1, 2012. Similarly, Cassandra has one younger son named Luke Marino, born on October 18, 2016.

Where is Cassandra Marino today?

Currently, Marino is residing in Los Angeles, California. She is living happily with her husband and three children. As per her Insta bio, she loves to build home and bring new ideas to life. However, where is she working and the address of her workplace are unknown since she likes to be confidential about her personal life.

Cassandra Marino and her social media presence

Though Casey comes from a big family in the American entertainment industry, she prefers to live out of the limelight. She does not show up her personal life much in media. What's more, she has a private Instagram account.

Cassandra Marino’s Net Worth

Cassandra possesses a net worth of $2 million. She accumulates the major portion of her money as an Interior Designer. As per sources, a designer can earn an average salary of $60,659 per year in the US.

title: Yasmine Yousaf
body:
Yasmine Yousaf is a lead vocalist of an American electronic dance music band Krewella which was formed in Chicago, Illinois, United States. Yasmine with her sister Jahan has released multiple albums and singles under the band Krewella. She also performs worldwide with her sister which has helped them gain fame and popularity. Most people know Yasmine from her musical career but do they know about her early life, her professional journey from the beginning, and her boyfriend? We'll be discussing everything you need to know about rising singer and performer in this article.

Yasmine Yousaf's early life

She was born on February 18, 1992, in Houston, Texas. After that Yasmine along with her family moved to Chicago, Illinois when she was 18 years old. She was born to her father Sohail Yousaf and her mother Neda Yousaf. Sohail Yousaf, 62, is a Pakistani who moved to the United States, and while Neda Yousaf was born Neda Zemliauskas to half german and half Lithuanian parents and currently is of 64 years of age. Yasmine was always passionate about singing and songwriting from an early age. Hence, she followed her passion and tried her luck multiple times before gaining fame in the music industry.

Yasmine Yousaf is one of the founding members of the Krewella band: Her musical career

Initially, Yasmine was a support vocalist for the indie rock band  'Sunset and Camden' before being associated with her own band Krewella. Yasmine,  Jahan, and Kris Trindi formed the musical band Krewella in 2007. Krewella is an American musical band that the Yousaf sisters along with Trindi formed in Northbrook, Chicago that primarily focuses on EDM, dance-rock, and dance-pop genres. The band went on to produce numerous pieces of music before gaining fame. Krewella was signed by the Monstercat music label at the end of 2011 and began to promote the band via social media posts and also by partnering with youtube's EDM channel for larger publicity. The band released their first original song "killin' it" under the label Monstercat. Moreover, Krewella won the best breakthrough artist at the 2012 International Dance Music award after performing live around the globe.
 
View this post on Instagram
 

A post shared by Yasmine (@krewellayasmine)

The billboards announced that 'Krewella is going to be huge' and listed their debut album 'Get Wet' in the Top 10 of US Billboard 200 in its first week of release. Consecutively the band released their second single Live For The Night partnering with the producer group Cash Cash. Yasmine has been involved in the band till today and together with other members has released many albums and singles.

Yasmine Yousaf is a tattoo lover

The three band members decided to give up their studies and career to give Krewella all the time on June 10, 2008. At first, Yasmine met Kris in Glenbrook North High School where she and her sister used to study. The three members have inked '6-8-10' on their bodies to remember the day of starting together. [caption id="attachment_1584" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Yasmine Yousaf's Kurt Kobain tattoo[/caption] Yasmine is a huge fan of the famous American rock band Nirvana. Apart from being just a fan, she has a tattoo of half-dead Kurt Kobain on her right forearm. A fan designed the tattoo for Yasmine.

Former band member Kris Trindi left the Krewella band in 2014

The Krewella band announced that Kris has left the band in September 2014. After that Trindi filed a lawsuit for $5 million against the Yousaf sister. Trindi accused the Yousaf sister of treating him unfairly. Later the Yousaf sister filed a lawsuit against him. They accused him of being an alcoholic and creating a problem for them while performing live shows. [caption id="attachment_1590" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Kris Trindi with Yousaf sisters[/caption] Yasmine along with her sister released the band's first single Say Goodbye after Trindi's exit from the band. The single reflected Trindi's exit from the band. Since then there are only Yousaf sisters in the band and has been releasing a number of albums and singles.

Know about Yasmine Yousaf's sister Jahan Yousaf

Jahan Yousaf is the older sister of Yasmine Yousaf. She was born on August 27, 1989, in Northbrook, Illinois. Jahan is one of the members of the Krewella band along with her sister. Apart from being just a member, she is also the DJ for the band. [caption id="attachment_1579" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Jahan Yousaf: Krewella's DJ and Yasmine's sis.[/caption] Besides, it was Yasmine who first met Kris Trindi at a frat party when she was 16 years old. This is how they became closer and eventually started a band. Currently, the Yousaf sisters actively produce numerous albums and singles under their band Krewella.

Who is Yasmine Yousaf dating now?

She is like many other celebrities who prefer to be open about their personal life. Currently, she is dating Devin Oliver and is extremely happy about her relationship with him. We can see the evidence of her boyfriend in her Instagram post.
 
View this post on Instagram
 

A post shared by Yasmine (@krewellayasmine)

Who is Yasmine Yousaf's boyfriend Devin Oliver?

Devin Oliver is an American who is the lead vocalist for the electronicore band 'I see stars'. It was formed in 2006, in Warren, Michigan. [caption id="attachment_1577" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Devin Oliver in Vacation.[/caption] His band released their debut album 3-D in 2009. After that, the band has been releasing many albums and singles out of which songs like Calm Snow, Murder Mitten, Running with Scissors, and many more for the band which became a smash hit. Moreover, Oliver has been actively present in the music industry just like his girlfriend Yasmine Yousaf.

Net worth

Yasmine Yousaf has accumulated a net worth of around $1 million. She is active in the band and performs live on different shows around the world which is essential for her to earn money. Her band also releases pieces of music regularly which is one of her main sources of income.

title: Kelly Harmon
body:
Kelly Harmon (aka Tic-Tac girl) is a famous American actress and model of the 80s who today, is also an entrepreneur. Her role as Sunny Hayward in ‘Bay City Blues, made her popular as an actress. In the same way, Harmon gained a new height from the commercial Tic-Tac mint. The Tic-Tac girl is not only an actress, but she owns a company too. She has become a successful entrepreneur at the current time. How did she switch her career, from an actress to an entrepreneur? And what is she doing today? Let’s dig into everything about her: her early life, her career as an actress and designer, her family background, her love life, and her net worth.

Kelly Harmon’s Early Life: Her Parent

Kelly Harmon was born as the middle child to the father Thomas Dudley Harmon and the mother Elyse Knox on November 9th, 1948 in California, USA. A well-known actress, she was born to a famous and multitalented family, father Dudley Harmon and Elyse Knox.  [caption id="attachment_1474" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Kelly Harmon in her Young age. Source: TV show stars[/caption] Her father Thomas, sometimes familiar with the nickname ‘Old 98’, was an American Football player. He was also a military pilot, actor, and sports broadcaster. Moreover, Harmon’s mother, Elyse was also a popular actress, model, and fashion designer. Kelly followed her mother’s path, in the modeling and acting field.

Her Siblings

Besides, Kelly has two siblings; an older sister named Sharon Kristin Nelson and a younger brother named Thomas Mark Harmon. [caption id="attachment_1619" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Kelly with her sibling and mother.[/caption] While talking about her siblings' profession, they all are known faces of the TV industry. Kelly's older sister, Sharon is a painter, author, and actress. Likewise, her younger brother Thomas is a popular TV and film actor. All three siblings show their talent parallelly and gained huge success in the glam world. The Harmon siblings grew up watching their versatile parents, who later gained abundant success in their careers and established themselves in their respective fields. This really inspired them to do good in their career as well.

How old is Kelly Harmon?

As of 2022, Kelly is 74 years old.

Kelly's Ethnicity and Nationality

Harmon belongs to the Caucasian ethnicity and her nationality is American.

Kelly Harmon’ career as an actress 

At the age of 14, Kelly started her career with the CBS Network’s TV series ‘The New Loretta Young Shout’. In the show, the actress played the character named Teedee Doley. [caption id="attachment_1475" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Kelly Harmon is a popular model. Source: Celebrity XYZ[/caption] She started being active in the TV industry in 1973. She also worked as a voice-over artist and, played the role of voice artist in the drama film Jonathan Livingston Seagull. The drama later gained two Academy Award nominations. In this particular drama, she voiced a character named Kimmy. Likewise, in 1976, she appeared in a couple of episodes of the detective TV series ‘Switch’. In 1978, the American actress was seen playing a minor role in ‘California Suite’, a comedy-drama film.

Kelly Harmon's Growth in her acting career

The year 1979 was fruitful for Kelly, which granted her a role in two series. In the year, she played the role of Sarah in an episode of the science fiction TV series ‘Battlestar Galactica’. Also, she made an appearance in the successful crime drama series on NBC TV Network ‘Chips’. Furthermore, in 1980, she played a character named Laurie in one episode of the detective series ‘The Incredible Hulk’. Similarly, the next year, in 1981, she appeared in an American TV Soap opera The Young and the Restless. Additionally, Kelly also played supporting roles in two different TV series named Nero Wolfe and One Day at a Time. Also, in the same year of 1981, she was signed to play the character ‘Jenifer’ in the episode The Protectors in Police drama TV series, T.J. Hooker. Well-known for her several roles in numerous TV series, people appreciated Kelly massively for her work in the Tic-Tac commercial, which eventually gave her the moniker Tic-Tac girl in the 1980s.

Kelly Harmon is an Entrepreneur

Kelly is an entrepreneur. She has her own Interior and design company in Los Angeles, California. By the name, you can assume what actually the company specializes in. Popular magazines like ‘House Beautiful’ and ‘Town and country, have highlighted her company’s work, thus it is a successful company.

Kelly is also a Costume Designer

She is not just the owner of a company, she is also a costume designer. Her career as a costume designer started in 2010. She worked as a costume designer in the well-known TV reality show ‘Top Chef Master’, a competitive show. In 2010, she took a break from her acting career to indulge in designing. However, the same year, she showed up in her brother Mark's documentary.

Who is Kelly Harmon’s Husband? Is she divorced? 

Kelly Harmon is currently enjoying married life with her spouse. Since June 24th, 1984, she is in a marital relationship with  Robert L. Miller.  Miller is an L.A.-based publishing entrepreneur. As an MBA student, he started his business career at the parent company of Sports Illustrated (American Sports Magazine), Time Inc. He already has been an executive at Time-Life Books. Robert is C.O.G. Miller's (who is a founder of Pacific Lighting Cooperation) great-great-grandson. Nonetheless, in her 74 years of life, the beautiful actress married twice. On May 31, 1969, she exchanged vows with the automotive executive John Zachary DeLorean. But after two years, they got separated and they divorced on June 3, 1973. [caption id="attachment_1618" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Kelly with her first husband John.[/caption] Eventually, after 11 years of her divorce, she met Robert Lyman Miller. Now, the successful designer and actress is living blissful married life with her second husband.

Kelly Harmon's Children

According to different sources, Harmon has three children altogether from her marriages. However, the name of her children is unknown.

Where is Kelly Harmon now?

Today, Kelly is living with her second husband Robert Lyman Miller. They are residing together in Southern California.

Kelly Harmon’s net worth

Kelly Harmon's net worth is estimated at around $5 million. Today, her source of income is majorly her design company in Los Angeles. As per sources, a designer can earn around $58K in the United States. Besides, throughout her life, she earned a name, fame, and money being an actress and model.

title: Dino Guilmette
body:
Dino Guilmette, also known as Joseph Lizzi on social media (Facebook), is famous for his committed relationship with Shayanna Jenkins, the ex-fiancee of the late American Football player Aaron Hernandez. Dino’s girlfriend Shayanna is also a TV Personality and an Instagram sensation. While discussing the profession of Guilmette himself, he is an entrepreneur, who owns a bar as well. Furthermore, he once even tried his hands at boxing. Besides, this article will explore the detailed information regarding Dino Guilmette including his birthplace, family, relationship, and children.

Who is Dino Guilmette? His early life

 On 11th August 1978 in Rhode Island, he was born to his mother Donna Guilmette, and father William Guilmette II.  [caption id="attachment_1414" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Dino Guilmette with his child.[/caption] He belongs to the American nationality and has Caucasian ethnicity. At the moment, he is 44 years old. Dino Guilmette was brought up with his eight other siblings including seven sisters named Dina Patnaud, Michelle, Tammy, Kathy Guilmette Cipriano, Maria, Debbie Ziadeh, and Patti Davis, and one brother named William Guilmette III. All of them spent their early life in Cranston, Rhode Island. 

His brother passed away in 2016

Sadly, Dino Guilmette’s elder brother died in 2016, which of course at the time, had broken the entire Guilmette family. The cause of his siblings' death is not available. Despite the sad incident that occurred in the Guilmette family, they stood together and persevered through the tough situation. As of now, they spend a fruitful time and beautiful bonding together. Likewise, we can see the solidarity between Dino and his seven sisters from the posts shared on Dino’s Instagram account.

Dino Guilmette’ Educational Background   

Talking about Dino’s education, he along with all his siblings went to Johnston Senior High School. Furthermore, Dino received a post-graduate degree in Business Administration in finance from the University of Rhode Island (Feinstein Providence Campus). He graduated in 2000. Similarly, Dino had gone to the University of Florida.

Dino Guilmette and Shayanna Jenkins Relationship: Are they married?

Dino first came to media prominence after he started dating Shayanna. His girlfriend is renowned to the world as the late Football tight end Aaron Hernandez’s fiancee. [caption id="attachment_1409" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Dino shares a relationship with Shayanna. Source: Daily Mail[/caption] Dino and Shayanna have been dating since 2017. The couple first met in Rhode Island through a mutual friend. Jenkins had moved to Rhode Island in 2017 after the demise of her ex-fiancee, Aaron Hernandez (a late American Football player at New England Patriots). Her late fiancee Hernandez was a convicted murderer who killed semi-professional football player Odin Lloyd and later died by suicide inside the prison in April 2017. The demise of the ex-fiancee left Jenkins shattered. However, Jenkins' shift to Rhode Island brought Dino into her life. Eventually, after their first meeting, Guilmette and Jenkins started seeing each other and began dating. In the meantime, there are a lot of rumors that Dino and Shayanna have tied the knot, however, both of them remain mum about the situation.

How many children does Dino Guilmette have?

 Altogether, Dino has three children named Mia Guilmette, Giselle Guilmette, and Arielle Janelle Hernandez.  He shares Mia with his ex-girlfriend whose name is unknown. The 24-years old Mia is the eldest daughter of Dino. She received her formal education from Lasalle Academy. For her further studies she went to Salve Regina University and University of Rhode Island. Talking about her profession, well, she is an equestrian. Meanwhile, Dino's second child, Giselle, was born in 2018.  She is the only biological daughter between Dino and Jenkins. Lastly, his third daughter, Arielle, born September 6th, 2012, is the daughter between Shayanna and Aaron Hernandez. After Shayanna started dating Dino, he, like a loving and caring man that he is, adopted her daughter. 

Is Dino and Shayanna still together?

For all the fans and admirers of the couple who are curios to know whether the pair is still together or not, well, it’s hard to say. If we go through their social media account, we can hardly see their photos together. Nevertheless, both Dino and Shayana are open to sharing their beautiful family moments on social media. But, lately, they have rarely come up in front of the media, due to which people are assuming their separation. However, there is no confirmation regarding their separation. Seeing their shared family moments on their respective Insta, we can certainly say that both of them are prioritizing their children well being above anything else.

Dino’s connection with Shayana’s former boyfriend late Aaron Hernandez

Before his meeting with Shayana, he already had a connection with Shayana’s former boyfriend Aaron Hernandez. He used to play football with Shayanna’s ex-boyfriend, Aaron at the University of Florida. While Aaron went on made a career for himself in the NFL, Dino wasn't able to make it to the big leagues. Similar to Dino's interest in football, he also did boxing for a while, but that too didn't turn out good for him.

Dino once tried his hands in Modeling 

Between 2002 and 2003, Dino tried to pursue his career in modeling. He chose an online platform named One Model Place with the intention to step into the glam world. But his attempt didn’t work out as he expected due to which he changed his path. In the present day, he prefers to call himself a self-employed person. He owns a manufacturing company named Cranston D’Mici’ Industries.

Dino Guilmette's issues with the law; also filed for bankruptcy a couple of times

When Dino was 18, he was charged with felony assault due to which he underwent 1 year probation period. Further, in 2005, he was arrested twice, once in January 2005 for wilful trespass and once in October 2005 for misdemeanor assault. For his crime, he once again was put on a 1-year probation. Meanwhile, in both the years 2005 and 2014, he filed for bankruptcy in Rhode Island.  Despite all his troubles with the law, Dino, who came into the limelight as Shayanna’s boyfriend, persevered through it all and now is a successful entrepreneur.

Dino Guilmette’s Net Worth

As of 2022, Dino Guilmette’s net worth is estimated at $2 Million.  He earned the major source of his income through his work as an entrepreneur.

title: Ellen Heidingsfelder
body:
Ellen Heidingsfelder is the wife of Cooper Manning. He is an American entrepreneur and a famous television persona famous for his work in the show, The Manning Hour for Fox Sports. Aside from being Cooper Manning's wife, what else do we know about Ellen Heidingsfelder? Where did she spend her childhood? What is her profession? We are here to talk all about Ellen Heidingsfelder’s life including some facts about her married life with her husband.

 Ellen Heidingsfelder’s early life

Ellen was born on December 20, 1968, in New Orleans, Los Angeles, USA. Considering her birthdate, her zodiac sign is Sagittarius. Talking about her parents, she was born to Charles E Heidingsfelder and Dota Heidingsfelder. She spent most of her childhood growing up in New Orleans. For early education, Ellen attended the Academy of Sacred Heart School.  Ellen studied law at the University of Virginia and added her academics by pursuing her studies at Loyola University Law School. She was an excellent student, dedicated to her studies and academics. The lawyer is a Catholic as she was born in a prosperous and flourishing Catholic family. Moreover, she is not the only child in her household. She has two siblings growing up together named Molly Silvia Heidingsfelder and Jane Heidingsfelder. These sisters wholeheartedly share a special connection and genuine love for each other.

Ellen Heidingsfelder’s career as a successful attorney

Ellen is an accomplished lawyer. She is based in New Orleans. She keeps most of her life private [caption id="attachment_1310" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Ellen Heidingsfelder with her husband[/caption] Moreover, her husband is a TV presenter. Though both have a separate professional life, it is always interesting to see where this couple is going. 

Ellen Heidingsfelder married life and children

After a few years of their relationship, Ellen and Cooper exchanged their vows in the year 1999. This gorgeous couple has three children. They have two sons Archie Manning and Heid Manning and a daughter May Manning. Their daughter May (the eldest), has been focusing on volleyball for now. She is currently playing for the Girls' Varsity Volleyball Team at the Academy of Sacred Heart.

Senior Night for volleyball games all across Louisiana tonight. We're live streaming at Sacred Heart where OH May Manning has been @ASHRosarySports team captain since her SOPHOMORE year. Mom & Dad- Ellen and Cooper Manning have plenty to be proud of with @maymanning4real pic.twitter.com/nnSKdOAOu4

— Varsity Sports Now (@VSNLouisiana) October 27, 2020
Archie(the middle child) and Heid(the youngest) both love playing football. Archie is already a football quarterback for Isidore Newman school. He made his debut in 2020, against Booker T. Washington. They won the match 55-22. Her husband Cooper once stated that he is happy that all his kids love sports.

Know about Ellen Heidingsfelder's husband and his family

Ellen’s husband Cooper, is a TV host on The Dan Patrick Show. He hosts his own show, The Manning Hour on Fox Sports Channel. In addition, he works as a senior managing director of investor relations for AJ Capital Partners. Besides, Cooper was born in New Orleans, Louisiana, on March 6, 1974. He is the eldest son of the former football quarterback, Archie Manning, and his mother, Olivia Williams Manning. Archie is a former American Football Quarterback. He is now a retired player, who played in the National Football League(NFL) for 13 seasons with the New Orleans Saints. Cooper's mother Olivia, served as one of the chairpersons for the Longue Vue House & Gardens fundraiser called Sentimental Journeys. 

The Manning Brothers

Cooper has two brothers: Peyton Manning and Eli Manning. Peyton’s full name is Peyton Williams Manning. He was born in New Orleans, Louisiana, on March 24, 1976. He is a former football quarterback who played in the National Football League(NFL) for 18 seasons.  Adding, Peyton married Ashely Thompson in 2001. They have a son and daughter named Marshall Williams Manning and Mosley Thompson Manning. [caption id="attachment_1316" align="aligncenter" width="450"] The Manning Brothers.[/caption] Meanwhile, the youngest brother, Eli was born in New Orleans, Louisiana, on January 3, 1981. The youngest brother's full name is Elisha Nelson Manning. Further, he is a former American football quarterback for the National Football League(NFL). He played for 16 seasons with the New York Giants.  Eli Manning married  Abby Mcgrew in 2008. They have three daughters; Ava Frances Manning, Lucy Thomas Manning, and Caroline Olivia Manning, and a son named Charles Elisha Manning.

Ellen Heidingsfelder' spouse Cooper Manning's football career

Cooper was always interested in sports but his career was cut short due to injuries. According to sources, his injuries started before his freshman season. The diagnosis began with numbness that Cooper suffered in his hands and fingers, with some atrophy in his right bicep. Sadly, he was diagnosed with spinal stenosis that narrows the spinal canal at the young age of 18 and had to give up his career in football. Nevertheless, Cooper is a famous personality now. It is safe to say that he has achieved having quite a successful career.

How much is Ellen Heidingsfelder's net worth?

Ellen makes quite a fortune with her profession as an attorney. The Lawyer’s net worth is around $1 million to $5 million. Besides, Ellen married one of the wealthiest families in New Orleans, Louisiana. Her husband Cooper Manning’s net worth is around $15 million.

title: Carrie Melago
body:
Carrie Melago is an American reporter who currently works as a managing editor at Chalkbeat news reporting agency. Although she has her own identity she is also known as the wife of popular journalist Jonathan Lemire. The couple has been married for several years. So how did their relationship start? Does the couple share any children? Further, most people know Carrie Melago as a journalist but what about her early life, her personal life. Let's find out all about her.

Carrie Melago's early life

She was born in 1976, in Greensburg, Pennsylvania. She is the daughter of Robert Melago and Linda Melago. Carrie, a young independent, and charismatic woman is 45 years old. Melago was very passionate about her studies from her early days. Therefore she went to universities for her higher studies. She completed her bachelor's degree from the University of Maryland between 1994 to 1998. [caption id="attachment_1449" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Carrie Melago during her free time.[/caption] Furthermore, she attended Colombia University from 2002 to 2004 in order to complete her master's degree in American studies.

Know about Carrie Melago's Parents

As mentioned earlier Carrie Melago was born to Robert and Linda Melago. Her father, Robert is a retired mathematics teacher at Greensburg Salem High School. Additionally, he was also the athletic director at the aforementioned school.

Found this 1972 article about my dad being tapped as a PA high school athletic director and love that the news was important enough to be leaked — and for the leak to be formally condemned by the school board. pic.twitter.com/zi0z6F0SLy

— Carrie Melago (@carriemelago) August 7, 2021
Similarly, Linda used to teach French during her time at Harrold Middle School which is also located in Greensburg. Just like her husband, Linda is retired as well.

Is Carrie Melago a reporter too? Melago's professional journey

Yes, Carrie Melago is a reporter. Talking about her journey, Melago began her career as a news reporter at New Haven Register where she worked from 1998 to 2002. Carrie decided to study Master's degree so, she went to university between 2002 and 2004. Consequently, she wasn't working during this period. After completing her Master's degree she worked as a reporter for the Long Island bureau from August 2004 to March 2005. The reporter also worked for the crime department of the New York Daily News from April 2005 to August 2006. Subsequently, after being a crime reporter she became an education reporter from September 2006 to September 2008 for the same news agency. But wait, her portfolio doesn't stop here.

Carrie Melago as an editor

The reporter began her editor journey as a morning assignment editor from October 2008 to December 2009. She then got the promotion and became Assistant city editor from December 2009 to June 2012 for New York Daily News agency. She then left New York News Agency and joined The Wall Street Journal in June 2012 where she worked as a digital editor in Greater New York. Being a digital editor she oversaw digital operations and drove real-time coverage of events in the New York City area. During the later part of her time in The Wall Street Journal, she became an editor and was responsible for newsroom training programs including digital training, new hire orientation, and masterclasses for editing. Currently, she is the managing editor for the local news network Chalkbeat since July 2019. Carrie is responsible for daily and enterprise coverage in Chalkbeat's New York, Philadelphia, Indianapolis, and Newark bureaus.

Carrie Melago and Jonathan Lemire's Marriage

Jonathan and Carrie first met at New York Daily News where they both worked as reporters. Apart from being colleagues in the same field of journalism, the couple began to fall in love with each other. After dating for a while they decided to tie the knot. [caption id="attachment_1448" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Carrie Melago's husband is also a journalist.[/caption] The journalists' duo exchanged vows on September 27th, 2008 at Oratory Church of St. Boniface which is located in Brooklyn. The whole ceremony was performed by a roman catholic priest, Reverend Joel M. Warden. Despite being involved in front of the media, Melago is quite secretive about her personal life and hasn't shared anything about her two sons. She only shares tweets related to them but without any clue on what their name is or their face.

Can the weather please remain nice because I can’t take another depressing installment of my 7yo’s weekend news pic.twitter.com/ODDvGtWxkv

— Carrie Melago (@carriemelago) May 13, 2022

My 10yo: What is that pic.twitter.com/alAM42afl0

— Carrie Melago (@carriemelago) November 29, 2021
According to her tweets shown above, Carrie and Melago share two sons and they are of 10 and 7 years of age, as of now. Although there is no information available about their kids we hope they will disclose the information soon. It's no wonder why the beautiful couple is together for almost 22 years. They share the same interest in journalism.

Know more about Jonathan Lemire

Jonathan Lemire is an American reporter who was born on 28 November 1979 in Lowell, Massachusetts, and currently works for MSNBC as a new host for the company's program way too early succeeding Kasie Hunt. The reporter is also the White House bureau chief of Politico from November 2021. Apart from being a reporter, Lemire has written a book too. He wrote The Big Lie: Election Chaos, Political Opportunism, and the state of American Politics After 2020. [caption id="attachment_1447" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Jonathan Lemire while reporting.[/caption] Lemire was born to parents Robert and Susan Lemire. He completed his high school at Central Catholic High School in Lawrence, Massachusetts. In 2001, he finished his bachelor's degree in history from Columbia University.

Net worth

Carrie Melago has been in journalism for a long time and is quite successful. According to the financial report of Chalkbeat she earns around $115,000 annually. Her net worth is estimated to be around $3 million.

title: Ann Archambault
body:
Ann Archambault is known for being the ex-wife of Joe Buck, an American sportscaster. She also works for Amazon as a senior product manager. Joe Buck is a famous sportscaster who currently works for the ESPN network. He provides commentary for the Major League Baseball and National Football League. Most people know about the famous sportscaster but what about his ex-wife Ann Archambault. Here today we will discuss Ann's career, and the relationships she had in this article below.

The early life of Ann Archambault

Ann Archambault was born in St. Louis, Missouri on the 30th of November, 1969. As of now, she is 52 years of age. She was born to her dad Thomas Archambault and mom Jackie Archambault. There is no information available about her siblings as she is very secretive about her personal life. Ann completed her high school at Spring Woods High School which is located in Houston, Texas. She also holds a bachelor's degree from the University of Mississippi.

Know more about Ann Archambault’s ex-husband Joe Buck

Joe Buck was born Joseph Francis Buck on April 25, 1969, in St. Petersburg, Florida. Joe was born to the sportscaster Jack Buck, a popular sportscaster, and his mother Carol. The sportscaster was raised in St. Louis where he went to St. Louis Country Day School. He went to the Indiana University Bloomington, though he never graduated. [caption id="attachment_1358" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Joe Buck while reporting news[/caption]   Buck became a popular sportscaster through his work at the fox news channel from 1993 to 2022. He worked for fox sports as a lead play-by-play announcer for the channel’s National Football League and Major league Baseball. What's more, Joe is a six-time Emmy award winner.

Marriage between Ann Archambault and her ex-husband Joe buck

Joe Buck and Ann were high school sweethearts. They began dating through their high school days and continued their relationship forward. [caption id="attachment_1360" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Ann Archambault With her husband and daughter[/caption]   After dating for some time Joe Buck decided to propose to her in the best way he can. Joe, invited Ann to the KMOX postgame show at Mike Shannon’s Steaks and Seafood where he went down to one knee and proposed to her all the while the incident was being broadcasted live. Without delaying and thinking Ann said 'yes.' Subsequently, the couple decided to get married and tied the knot on January 23, 1993. They were in a healthy relationship and stayed married to each other for almost 19 years.

The divorced couple has two daughters

Older Daughter is an Actress

Ann and Joe have two daughters Natalie and Trudy Buck. Natalie was born in 1996 whereas Trudy was born in 1999. Natalie is a telecommunications engineer and an aspiring actor. She was interested in acting from an early age. She took acting classes at the Vagabond School of the Arts in Chicago in 2007. Apart from this Natalie also got into a scriptwriting course at The Second City in 2016. [caption id="attachment_1362" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Natalie Buck is the oldest daughter between Ann and Joe.[/caption] The aspiring actor can be seen in a couple of movies. Recently she was part of ‘Marry Me’ which was released in 2022. Her other films include Blue Bloods (2010) and The Stars Between Us (2022). Besides, Natalie desire to follow in her dad’s footsteps and become a sportscaster.

Younger Daughter is also a Cinematic Artist

Trudy Buck is the younger daughter between Ann Archambault and Joe Buck. Just like her sister she is also in the cinematic business. Trudy started acting from an early age and has been pursuing her career since then. Apart from her work in several movies, she is recognized for her work in Marshall’s Miracle where she played a character named Chelsea. [caption id="attachment_1364" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Trudy Buck is the youngest daughter between Joe and Ann.[/caption] As Trudy is more intrigued by behind the camera, she studied cinematic arts at the University of Southern California's School of Cinematic Arts. Apparently, both Natalie and Trudy are on good terms with their parents Joe and Ann.

Ann Archambault and Joe Buck got divorced: What was the reason?

Though their relationship was going happily they began to have some issues with each other during the latter part of their marriage. So, the couple decided to end their marriage after 19 years and got divorced in 2011. As they didn’t disclose any information on why they got divorced, the reason for their separation is unknown. Though the couple got divorced both of them are good friends these days.

Ann Archambault’ professional career

Apart from being the ex-spouse of a famous sportscaster she also holds her own identity and is a successful woman. The celebrity ex-wife has a thriving career in finance. After working in finance for a while she later joined Amazon. Currently, she is the senior product manager at Amazon where her work is developing user-centric product design, product photographs, and many more. She also works as a financial advisor at amazon.

Rumors about another marriage

There was a rumor of Ann marrying a guy named Scott Kitchel. But to be absolutely clear, she hasn’t married anyone since being divorced from Joe in 2011. [caption id="attachment_1365" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Joe Buck with his current wife Michelle Beisner[/caption] On the other hand, Joe is currently married to his current wife Michelle Beisner 2014. The couple shares twin boys named Wyatt Joseph and Blake Andrew, born on April 26, 2018.

Was Ann Archambault a cheerleader?

Ann Archambault was never a cheerleader in her life. The information was mixed up as a person was sharing the same name as hers. Although Joe’s current wife Michelle was a cheerleader during her time in college.

Ann Archambault Net worth

It is difficult to estimate the net worth of someone very secretive about their life. However, from multiple resources, it is believed to be that her net worth is around $5 million.

title: Katy Marioni
body:
Katy Marioni is an American social media star and an influencer who currently lives in Los Angeles, California. She has a vast number of followers on her different social media platforms. On her social media platforms, she shares content related to fashion and beauty products. Frequently, she promotes a variety of products. Most people are excited to know about the upcoming star. So what do we know about her personal life? How did Marioni start her career? Who is her boyfriend? Did you know Katy has an OnlyFans site?  Let's discuss everything here today.

Katy Marioni Early life, Parents, Birthday, and Education

She was born on 26th April in Sonoma, California. She is the daughter of Jim Marioni and Leslie Marioni. As of now, she is in her 20s.

Both the parent of Katy is quite secretive about their personal life and has very few presences on social media platforms. Therefore there is no useful information about her parents.

The influencer attended her hometown high school, Sonoma Valley High School. After high school, she completed her bachelor’s degree from the University of Los Angeles.

Katy Marioni career as an influencer

From an early age, Katy was passionate about modeling. She soon started sharing pictures on her social media platforms. Soon, she gained a lot of fans which motivated her to share more such photos. Eventually, she started her modeling career in Los Angeles. Nevertheless, after trying modeling for some time she gained very little attention than she desired. Consequently, she focused more on creating content on social media platforms. As a result, she is widely recognized as an influencer than a model.
 
View this post on Instagram
 

A post shared by Katy Marioni (@katymarioni)

Katy Marioni is active on all major social media platforms. She has accounts on Instagram, Twitter, and TikTok where she goes by the usernames @katymarioni, @katy_marioni, and @katymarioni respectively. As she is sharing content regularly, she is gaining popularity day by day. Due to her popularity, she is pursued by different brands to promote their brands. The influencer advertises a variety of fashion and swimwear brands like Boutine LA, Neena Swim, Khassani Swimwear, Fashion Nova, and many others. Moreover, the influencer was seen featuring in the promotional video for Lord Vodka.

Katy Marioni is on OnlyFans

Apart from her presence on common social media platforms, she is also active on OnlyFans. What's more, Katy is nowadays more focused on her OnlyFans account where she streams live content for the fans and earns a huge amount of money. [caption id="attachment_1331" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Katy has an OnlyFans account which has helped her to gain a lot of fans.[/caption] For the newbies, OnlyFans is a website where influencer shares their content exclusively for their fans. It is a subscription-based site where fans need to subscribe to view the content of their favorite star. Katy uses this platform to share intimate content with her fans. As per reports she has been featured in adult films also. 

Who is Katy Marioni's boyfriend?

Well, as we mentioned before, Katy is an incredibly secretive person, who rarely likes to share information about her personal life. That being said, back in January 2021, she tweeted about a boyfriend. In the Tweet, she mentioned that her boyfriend is not a doctor but has a Ph.D. Unfortunately, after this Tweet, Katy has not said anything about her partner.

my boyfriend isn’t a doctor but he has a PHD

— Katy Marioni (@katy_marioni) January 19, 2021
Meanwhile, there is no information available if she has a child.

Katy Marioni has an attractive body

Katy is an attractive model whose physical appearance lures many people. She has maintained a slim and attractive body.  As a model, she gives most of her time to maintaining her body. Marioni likes to eat healthily and exercise daily to keep herself fit. Moreover, she also shares her workout video regularly on her social media platforms. [caption id="attachment_1330" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Katy looks incredible in her black dress.[/caption] Her body measurement is approximately 36-26-36 (Chest – waist - hips). She has black eyes and blonde hair. According to online tabloids, her height is around 5 feet and 8 inches. 

Some interesting facts about Katy Marioni

Katy Marioni is an animal lover. She likes to pet a variety of animals, especially dogs.

like how could i not?! pic.twitter.com/xkIJ9nV4bK

— Katy Marioni (@katy_marioni) May 1, 2021
She is really kind and seems to be a genuine person as her Instagram bio reads ‘an act of kindness never goes wasted’. Marioni likes to travel to different places and even encourages her fans to travel.  Her zodiac sign is Taurus. It also seems that Marioni likes to shop as she is an influencer and fashion lover. Looking at her posts on social media, she wears fashionable and designed clothes.

Katy Marioni Net worth

Katy’s net worth is currently $300,000 according to online resources. Of course, she earned the majority of her earnings by promoting different brands and also through modeling. She earns around $10,000 for every promotional post.

title: Barbara Roufs
body:
Barbara Roufs was a model, later renowned as an American drag race trophy girl. She was in the spotlight, mostly regarding her beauty. People remembered her as a knockout girl in the golden age of the late seventies. Unfortunately, after a few successful years as a model, she ended her life by committing suicide in January of 1991. This automatically raised many curious questions and left the public vacant. So, what set her off to end her own life? Who was she married to? What made her exceptional? Let’s travel back and see-through Barbara's highlights in her sensational life.

Barbara Roufs’ Early Life before public recognition

Born in 1944, Barbara spent her childhood in the streets of Southern California. Speaking of her education, she attended a local private school in her hometown. According to sources, the model was the daughter of Thelma Ruby Riley and Wayne Riley. Her mother passed away on June 24, 2005, at the age of 86. She was not the only child in her family. She also had a sister Vivian Deaton and two brothers James Riley, and Bruce Riley. In addition, she also has an adopted brother named Ben Gube.

Barbara’ sensational modeling career in the racing scene

In the early period of the 70s, drag racing competitions were highly evolving. During this era, Barbara started gaining recognition as a model. She later became a trophy girl phenomenon in the racing business in California. Throughout this interchanging period, fashion was also under a statement of the new adaptation. The perfect timing to set a new trend was forever (still is) everyone’s go-to moment. [caption id="attachment_1265" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Barbara Roufs as a racing model.[/caption] The model back then presented herself in shorts and short dresses. With her long hair and never wearing bras, she set a standard for other models in the drag race. Moreover, she was one of the most attractive and charming women of her time and has frequently presented herself and proved worthy of all the hype she received. Her easy-going personality and blessed features went hand in hand with her modeling career in the racing scene. What's more, she had her passion diverted not only as a trophy queen but also towards how she presented herself in the public eye. She was confidently the talk of the town whenever she presented the drag race trophy. These excellent characteristics remain iconic in history.

Who was Barbara Roufs' husband?

According to sources, Barbara was already a mother of two at the age of 29, around the same time when she was in the limelight. From the beginning of her life, she loved remaining secretive from the public eyes. [caption id="attachment_1368" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Barbara Roufs modeling in the drag racing scene.[/caption] Due to her secretive nature, she rarely revealed any information about her husband or boyfriend, with whom she shared her children. What's more, until her death, there was no mention of her marriage. 

Barbara Roufs daughters

Back in 2016, a photographer Tom West had posted old pictures of the race trophy girl on his website. Some time after the photographs became public, one of Barbara's daughters Jet Dougherty came out in the open. Her appearance send waves around Southern California since the public never knew anything about Barbara's private life. Jet stated that her mother had some of her happiest days in the racing scene. She also mentioned how her mother always wanted to be famous and considering how fans are searching about her on the internet, her dream seems to have come true. Besides, Jet Dougherty is also a mother with a daughter named Crystal Dougherty. Meanwhile, information about Barbara's second daughter is still kept private.

Barbara Roufs’ Death: What made her to take such a drastic decision?

We can all say Barbara lived her life well even though it was a short one. According to sources, she committed suicide and died in January 1991 at the age of 47.  This took place just after a few years she quit the racing industry. The reason for her suicide is still dissolved in mystery.  [caption id="attachment_1239" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Barbara posing for a shoot.[/caption] The public was baffled when the news of her demise surfaced. Many felt sorry and heartbroken that they couldn’t help protect herself from whatever she was going through. Tom West, who at that time used to take pictures of the model, also sent his tribute to the trophy girl. The photographer was her close friend as he worked with her on several photoshoots. He often visited her family but never leaked any information about them. Despite everything, Barbara engaged and lead herself in one exciting life. She was the sexiest and hot drag race trophy queen in California.

How much was Barbara' net worth?

Barbara had a successful career and made a fortune between the late 1970s to early 1990s. Her net worth was around $1.5 - $2.5 million during this period.

title: Marshall Borden
body:
Marshall Borden is one of the finest American actors who rose to prominence after starring in movies like Quantum Leap, Says It in Russian, and many more.  Borden is mostly known as the husband of American actress, Lee Meriwether. Marshall’s wife, Lee Meriwether is a former Miss America and she won the title in 1955. She has also worked as a model and actress. Catwomen is one of her eminent roles. Borden and his wife, Lee, have been together since the late 90s. So, how did their marriage last so long? Want to know more about him? Scroll down to know more details about his personal life, Career, and many more.

Marshall Borden Early Life and Family

The popular actor, Marshall was born on August 10, 1935, in Howell, Michigan, United States. His actual birth name is Marshall E. Borden and his zodiac sign is Leo. He belongs to the English - German ancestry. Borden was born to his father Ambrose Washington and his mother Sally Reynolds Treat. He has not disclosed his parent’s profession yet as he likes to maintain privacy about his personal life.

Career and Education

Borden completed his High School at Eastern Michigan High School. He graduated from Eastern Michigan University, and he further studied at Wayne State University. Marshall has done numerous Television series and movies to date. He was active in the acting industry during the 90s. Diligent actor, Borden got some small roles at the beginning of his career. Later, he got more opportunities and played some Impactful roles like David Drucker in A Walton Wedding. He starred in A Christmas Carol in 1982. Following that Marshall appeared in an episode of the popular series Quantum Leap as Dr. Carrasco. He even wrote some impressive plays and movie scripts including The Artful Lodgers. He was popular for his amazing acting skills. However, he became more famous after getting married to Lee Meriwether.

Marshall Borden Relationship with his second wife Lee Meriwether

Marshall and Lee met for the first time in San Antonio where both of them were designated for the production of Angel House "Gaslight". Subsequently, they played in many dramas together including Lion in winter and Alone Together. Consequently, both of them started flourishing a good bond with each other. Marshall and  Lee Meriwether tied the knot on September 21, 1986. They had a private wedding ceremony in front of their family and close friends only. [caption id="attachment_1225" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Lee is Marshall's second wife.[/caption] This couple has been together for almost three-decade and they seem to be happy spending their marital life. However, they don’t share kids together but they have kids from Lee's past relationships.

Who are Marshall's children?

Marshall has two step-children from Lee, Lesley Aletter and Kyle Aletter. Lee shares her children with her first husband Frank Aletter. Frank and Lee were together for almost two decades and divorced in the year 1974. Frank was also an American film and television actor. Marshall's eldest step-daughter Kyle Aletter was born on May 31, 1960, in Los Angeles, California. She is an American actress widely known for her role in the movie The Day After. She had been married to Rory Oldham, Sadly they parted ways in 2005. His second step-daughter Lesley Aletter was also involved in the entertainment sector because of the influence of her parents and other family members. She was born on November 12, 1963, in Granada Hills, Los Angeles, California. She mostly worked as a stuntwoman.

Marshall’s wife Lee was Miss America in 1955

Marshall’s wife Lee Meriwether is one of the talented actresses who stepped into the entertainment industry after she won the beauty pageant and got the title of Miss America in 1955. After that, she got a scholarship and she utilized it to study acting with the famed teacher Lee Strasburg. She also learned dancing, singing, and fencing with some of the top coaches in New York. Lee was still attending her College in San Fransisco City College as a Radio and TV/Theatre Arts Major during her Pageant. She also mentioned in her personal blog that she participated in the Pageant because of her circle and said, “I never would have entered on my own.” She also mentioned that she was going through a rough time during her pageant. Her father had passed away recently before her show as she says, “the world had dropped out from under me”.

His wife, Lee was famous for her role as Catwomen

Lee was famous for her role as a famous DC comic character Catwomen in the original Batman movie in 1966. She had replaced Julie Newmar who had first portrayed the role of Catwomen on television and appeared in two seasons in the year 1967. [caption id="attachment_1226" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Lee played the role of Catwoman in the series, Batman.[/caption] She has also played some other impressive roles like Lily Munster in the popular Television series The Munsters today. She was nominated for the Golden Globe Awards as Best TV Actress twice and once for the Emmy Award as  Outstanding Continuing Performance by a Supporting Actress in a Drama Series.

Who is Marshall Borden's first wife Carol?

Marshall and Carol Lee Fox were together before he married Lee. Former sweethearts tied the knot on 2nd July 1960 and they were together for almost a decade. However, their marriage couldn't last long and they decided to get a divorce. Furthermore, they don't have any children together. Borden does not like to speak much about his ex-wife and he hasn't mentioned her in interviews or on social media. Likewise, Carol is also quite private about her personal life as well which is why there is not much information about her on the internet.

Marshall Borden Net worth

He has amassed about $12 million of net worth if we agree with online tabloids. Throughout her career, Borden has assembled a significant amount of riches because of his hard work and dedication to work. His primary source of revenue was acting, but he also made a lot of money on the side by writing numerous scripts for television movies, series, and dramas. Moreover, his wife has $200 million of net worth.

title: Kenya Duke
body:
Kenya Duke is known as the Ex-wife of an American comedian Gary Owen. Her Ex-husband was entitled as the Funniest Serviceman in America. Kenya rose to prominence after tying the knot with her ex-husband, despite her lack of involvement in the entertainment world. Unfortunately, this lovely couple parted ways nearly after two decades of marriage. But why did this beautiful couple decide to part ways? In this article, we shall find answers to the questions about her personal life, Marriage, and many more.

Early Life: Duke’s Father Passed Away When She Was 6 Years old

Duke was born on July 26, 1974, in Oakland, California. Her zodiac sign is Leo and she holds American nationality. She finished her education at a local school in Oakland. Duke's single mother, Barbara Jean Cooper raised her daughter in Oakland. Her father Roland Smith Watts was a navy officer who passed away during his service when Kenya was only 6 years old. [caption id="attachment_1213" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Kenya's father died when she was only six-year-old.[/caption] Kenya also states that her mother and father had a tough relationship. Kenya doesn't know much about her father because her mother doesn't talk much about her late spouse.

Physical Appearance

Kenya has a highly attractive physical appearance that draws a large number of fans and followers. Her face is almost symmetrical, and she appears tall and fit. Her dark skin goes well with her black hair. She also has a strong jawline and stunning black eyes. She is roughly 5 feet 5 inches tall.

Kenya’s journey in Entertainment Industry

Before marrying her ex-husband Gary, Kenya was not very involved in the entertainment world. But after their nuptials, she was exposed more to television and media. Nevertheless, she prefers to work behind the scenes rather than in front of the camera. She mostly worked as an additional crew and producer in different movies. She has appeared in many other Television Programs like The Steve Harvey, The Gary Owen Show, Aries Spears: Hollywood, Look I’m Smiling, and many more. [caption id="attachment_1214" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Kenya appeared in The Steve Harvey show alongside her ex-hubby Gary.[/caption]

Living Life as a Successful Businesswoman

She began her professional career as an accountant, but after marrying Gary, she resigned from her work to assist her husband with his business. Currently, Kenya is the creator and owner of Premier Sports and Corporate Travels. On March 20, 2009, she and her business partner Deshonne Jackson started their company. It's a domestic limited liability company that sells high-quality sporting equipment. She has been running her company successfully for over a decade.

Current Relationship Status

She has been taking a break and enjoying her single life since her divorce from her ex-husband, Gary Owen. After her divorce, she has not mentioned anyone as her lover Going through her Instagram, We can see that she is having an amazing time with herself.

Her marriage to the famous comedian Gary Owen

Kenya Duke married Gary Owen, her ex-husband, on July 19, 2003. The former couple had a small wedding in front of their friends and families. For the wedding, Kenya donned wore a gorgeous white gown and carried a white, while Gary wore a blue suit. [caption id="attachment_1216" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Kenya and Gary was married for more than 15-years.[/caption] The wedding, on the other hand, was a once-in-a-lifetime experience for all of them. The preacher fled since both the bride and groom were late for their weddings. Moreover, the baker also wrecked their five-tiered cake, so they were only able to cut only a little amount of cake.

How was their first meeting?

Gary and Kenya met for the first time in the 1990s. Gary was only starting as a comic at the time. They came into contact because of the NBA legend Shaquille O’Neil as around the time, Kenya was working for his clothing line. So one day, Shaq took his staff to a nightclub in Sunset Boulevard, La, where interestingly Gary was performing a stand-up. The first time they met, they didn't communicate with each other. It was only in their second meeting that the pair talked to each other. The pair met in the same place and this time, Kenya approached Gary but it was just to tell him that his performance today wasn’t on par with the other show she had seen. Regardless, Gary didn’t pay any heed to Kenya’s comment and instead asked for her number. After that, they had good communication, and sometimes later, their friendship blossomed into a romance.

How many kids does Kenya share with Ex-hubby Gary?

Kenya is the mother of three beautiful children named Emilio Owen Jr, Austin Owen, and Kennedy Owen. Her oldest son, Emilio was born on 18th January 1991. Duke shares Emilio with her previous husband. He was later adopted by her second husband Gary. [caption id="attachment_1215" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Kenya with her daughter Kennedy.[/caption] Kenya has two kids with her second hubby. Her second child, Austin was born on 27th November 2000 and, her youngest child, her only daughter Kennedy was born on July 3rd, 2002. She is currently studying at Agriculture and Technical State University.

Divorced after almost two decades of marriage: Their harsh separation

After nearly 18 years of marriage, this couple decided to part ways. Many fans who admired and cherished this couple, were devastated by the news. As for the reason behind their separation, well, it looks like a third-party involvement led to their divorce. According to an Instagram story by Kenya, Gary had been cheating on her with a mistress. [caption id="attachment_1217" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Kenya filed for divorce against Gary due to his infidelity.[/caption] She also mentioned that they had been traveling together in Florida and the Bahamas. She also states that her Ex-husband had been spending his earnings on vacation with his secret affair rather than contributing to the family. On the other hand, Kenya did not hesitate to reveal the identity of the girl, Gary had been dating. Her name is Brianna Johnson. She works as a nurse at Memorial Hermann Health in Texas. Kenya expressed her disappointment in Brianna being a mother herself and trying to ruin else’s family.

Kenya Duke and Gary Owen’ divorce settlement

Duke filed for divorce in the Los Angeles County Superior Court in California and the news about their divorce broke out on the 19th of March. She was granted custody of her children. Following this incident, Duke asked for $44,000 per month according to the legal filings acquired by TMZ. Duke also claimed that her ex-husband has a considerable amount of wealth. In the same legal docs obtained by TMZ, Duke stated that the amount she had requested is the same amount he would send into her bank accounts to cover credit card bills and other personal costs.

Who is Kenya Duke’s first husband?

Kenya has been very private about her first marital relationship. Thankfully, we found out that her first husband’s name is Emilio Toliver Sr.
 
View this post on Instagram
 

A post shared by Kenya Duke (@trulykenya)

Duke does not like to speak much about him and hasn’t mentioned it in any of her social media posts.

Kenya Duke On Social Media

Kenya appears to be quite active on social media. Her social media presence has a high level of interaction. She is largely active on Instagram, where she has roughly 76.2K followers. She utilizes her Instagram account to promote a variety of companies. Duke goes by the username @trulykenya on Instagram.

Net Worth

If we agree with online tabloids, it is estimated that Kenya has amassed about $4 million. It contains all of her assets. Throughout her career, Duke has amassed a significant amount of riches. Because of her hard work and dedication to work, she has been able to acquire such a large sum of money. Her business is her primary source of revenue, but she also makes a lot of money on the side by participating in numerous television movies, series, and programs. Moreover, she also got a substantial amount of money through her divorce settlement with Gary.
