title: Who is Raine Finley? Everything about Late Hollywood Actress Tawny Kitaen's Daughter
body:
Raine Finley is mainly known as the daughter of the famous American actress, model, and media personality Late Tawny Kitaen and former major league baseball player Chuck Finley. Like her mother, she works in the film industry, but not as an actress. Currently, she is learning about sound and music under the guidance of brilliant musical geniuses. The year 2021 was tragic for Raine as she lost her mother Tawny Kitaen at the age of 59. 5 months after her demise, Raine was all over the internet and media when she revealed the actual cause of her mother's death. So how is the life of Raine Finley at present? Is she dating anyone? We have plenty to share such as her early life, education, net worth, etc.

Raine Finley Family Background

Raine was born on 1st June 1998 in Newport Beach City in California, US State, to a wealthy family. Her father Chuck Finely was a fine baseball player and her mother Tawny Kitaen was a popular Hollywood actress. [caption id="attachment_1135" align="aligncenter" width="450"] A younger version of Raine Finley.[/caption] She has an elder sister Wynter Merin Finley born on 18th March 1993.  In 2002, her parents got divorced, and since then, Raine and Wynter had been living with her mother until her demise in 2021. Her mother Tawny died at the age of 59 due to dilated cardiomyopathy, a common heart disease. [caption id="attachment_1132" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Raine Finley in a get-together with her family.[/caption] Besides, Raine belongs to the white ethnic race and follows the Christian religion. She was brought up in New Port. Her parents Chuck and Tawny divorced in 2002 after which Tawny got both custody of her daughter.

Raine Finley Education

Maybe it was the influence of her father, Raine had a great amount of enthusiasm toward sports since childhood. At the age of 6, while studying at Corona del Mar High School, she used to play softball. She even was the recipient of the "Athlete of the Week" award for her match-winning performance in Junior High School. Afterward, at the age of 12, she played soccer full time and added the MVP Defensive Award for Junior Varsity to her accolades. [caption id="attachment_1136" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Raine Finley was photographed before a softball game.[/caption]

Raine Finley Career

For the longest time, Raine wanted to get involved in social work and collaborated with Children’s Hospital and the Boys and Girls’ Club as their partner fundraiser and began her community service from 2013 until 2017. Then, in 2017, she enrolled in “The Art Institute of California-San Francisco” to make her career in Music Composition for Digital Media. With a motive to have some side income along with experience, Raine worked as an intern at 92.9 Kjee Radio Station for 4 months. After finishing her internship, she even worked as a waitress at Delores Park Cafe in San Francisco for 8 months. In May 2019, her career began to shape up. She got an opportunity to join as an intern at Warner Bros. Entertainment and has been working there since. At the workplace, she is learning music composition under the supervision of experts like Mike Marchain and other companions. Additionally, Raine is acquiring lessons on ADR mixers, music supervision, and sound designing.

Is Raine Finley Dating Anybody?

Back in 2018, she shared a photo with a guy named Jack Garell. Though she didn't reveal if he was her boyfriend or not, the coziness in their picture said everything. [caption id="attachment_1133" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Raine Finley with her rumored boyfriend.[/caption] Nevertheless, she has kept her personal life private and there is not enough proof to justify her relationship status, her love is still a secret that awaits to be unfolded. We first came to know about her relationship through her Facebook account in which she shared a handful of photos with the guy.

More on Raine Finley's Mother Tawny Kitaen

Tawny Kitaen worked in the Hollywood industry throughout her life. She kickstarted her career as a Television actress with her appearance in the films like Malibu and California Girls and also starred in a few comedy as well as horror roles. However, she rose into the limelight after her appearance in heavy metal music videos that included  Ratt's "Back for More" (1984) and Whitesnake's "Still of the Night", "Is This Love" and "Here I Go Again" (all 1987).

Tawny Kitaen Had a Series of Relationships

Raine's mother Tawny was a hot sensation during her time. She certainly had raised many eyebrows and set many hearts on fire through her beauty. Likewise, Tawny was in relationships with a number of men. Tawny dated Ratt guitarist Robbin Crosby during and after high school. She also had a 1-year affair with O.J. Simpson., who at the time was married. In 1996, Tawny married famous singer David Coverdale in 1989, but unfortunately, the couple later divorced in 1991. [caption id="attachment_1141" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Tawny Kitaen with her first husband David Coverdale.[/caption] Raine Finley's father Chuck Finley was Tawny's second husband. They married in 1997 and a year later Raine was born. The pair separated in 2002.

Controversies Always Surrounded Tawny Kitaen

In 2002, Tawny was charged with domestic violence against her husband Finley which resulted in their divorce. Afterward, in 2006, prosecutors convicted Tawny of 15 grams of cocaine possession at her home in Orange County for which she went under 6 months of rehabilitation. She was arrested twice, first in 2009, and then in 2019 for driving under the influence in Newport Beach, California.

Raine Finley Net Worth

Raine Finley is currently working as an intern and her full-scale earning hasn't started yet. We can say that she is in the midway of her career where she is learning things in order to have a proper amount of income of her own in the future. However, money isn't an issue for her as she comes from a wealthy background. Her celebrity mother Tawny Kitaen has earned more than enough. After Tawny Kitaen's sad demise, all her properties and assets legally belong to her daughters Raine and Wynter. According to some sources, Raine Finley's present net worth is around $10,000 USD.

Raine Finley's Social Media Presence

Raine has an Instagram account that goes by the username "rainedayss." Currently, her Instagram has 830 followers to be exact. She has set her account in private mode, hence, we had no way to peek into it. On the other hand, Raine Finley also has a Facebook account with over 1K friends. However, she is inactive on Facebook as her last post dates back to 2020.

title: Maceo Shane Rapaport
body:
Maceo Shane Rapaport is a famous star kid. He is the son of a famous American actor and comedian Michael Rapaport and Nichole Beattie, a movie producer and a screenwriter. Talking about his education there is no further information available about his schooling and education qualifications. But as per his age, he might be enrolling in a high school. So, in today's episode let's dig more information about the personal and professional life of a famous star kid Maceo Shane Rapaport.

Maceo Shane’s parents, grandparents, and many more

Maceo was born in  December 2002 and in December of 2022, he will be 20. But his actual date of birth is not available. Meanwhile, he grew up with his brother Julian Ali Rapaport who is just two years older than him. Moreover, his grandparents are David Rapaport and June Brody. His grandmother is a radio personality. Information about his grandfather is not available.  [caption id="attachment_1350" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Maceo Rapaport, Michael Rapaport, and Julian Rapaport in an event of film festival[/caption] Likewise, his aunt Claudia Lonow is also an American actress, comedian, television writer, and producer. She is widely popular for portraying Diana Fairgate in the American TV drama, Knots Landing. On the other hand, his uncle Erik Rapaport is an Entrepreneur, Information Architect, and project manager who lives in Los Angeles.

How is the relationship between Maceos parents going on?

Nichole Beattie has best established herself as a talented actress portraying several roles on several TV series like Prison Break, Deep Blue Sea, and The War at Home. Moreover, she is also a talented writer as well as a producer with credits on season one of Prime Suspects and two episodes of The Walking Dead season three.  [caption id="attachment_1346" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Michael Rapaport with his ex-wife Nichole Beattie[/caption] Talking about the relationship between Nichole and Michael, well, they are divorced. They decided to separate after seven years of marriage. The former flames first met each other in the late 90s and started to date. They got married on 15th January 2000. However, there is no further information about how their wedding ceremony was. Moreover, the couple had two baby boys in the gap of two years. After several years of togetherness and having babies together the pair called it off and got separated following the legal laws. Both of them were given joint custody of their kids. 

Maceo Rapaport's parents now

After separating from each other Nichole never got married again. On the other hand, there is no strong information about her dating life after her divorce from Micheal. Meanwhile, Micheal tied the knot with Kebe Dunn who happens to be his girlfriend in the early 90s. [caption id="attachment_1348" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Michael Rapaport with his wife Kebe Dunn in an award ceremony[/caption] They got married in 2016 and they are yet to have kids. However, the duo had a controversial past together when they were dating. As a report by several media Micheal used to call Kebe even after their breakup and used to go to her apartment in the middle of the night. He even broke the glass of her apartment windows.

 Is Maceo Rapaport active on any social media platforms?

Talking about his social media activeness, he is not active on any sort of social media. As if he seems to be a quite private person. On the other hand, his dad Micheal is quite active on social media. He has already bagged 2.2 million followers on Instagram.  

Is Maceo Rapaport dating anyone?

Talking about his relationship status, there is no information available about who he might be dating. Only the time will reveal what his relationship status is like. But as of now considering all his facts, he might be focusing on his study to pursue his career.

What is the net worth of Maceo Rapaport?

Maceo is still a teenager to have his net worth. On the other hand, his father Micheal Rapaport has a net worth of $12 million which he earned through his acting career and businesses.

title: Claire Stoermer
body:
Claire Stoermer is widely known for being the mother of Euphoria actress Zendaya Coleman. She is professionally an elementary school teacher. She is not only a proud mother of her daughter Zendaya and a teacher but she is also an entrepreneur who owns Kizzmet Jewellery. Nonetheless, she came into the limelight because of her daughter Zendaya who not only portrayed the role in Euphoria but also in movies like Spiderman, Dune, and The Greatest Man Show. So, how is Claire Stoermer’s life at present? Further, in this article, we will dig into detail about Claire, her children, married life, and much more. So let's start!

Claire Stoermer's early life, family, and education

Claire was born on 24th March 1964 in Oakland, California. She is the daughter of Philip Hillary Stoermer and Daphne Carol Whitelaw. Moreover, she also has two siblings, Hillary Andrew Stoermer and Mark Andrew Stoermer.  [caption id="attachment_1203" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Claire as a child.[/caption] Talking about her nationality and ethnicity, she is an American citizen and has German and Scottish ancestry. Further, she grew up in her hometown of Oakland and went to Santa Clara University, in Santa Clara. She completed her graduation in 1987.

Claire Stoermer's career as a teacher 

Claire is truly devoted to her profession and still is a teacher at Elementry School. She started teaching three years after graduating. Furthermore, she went to Oakland United School District, a public school, for her first job as a teacher. Moreover, her daughter Zendaya praised her in an interview with Teen Vogue Magazine back in October of 2014. Jokingly, Zendaya also mentioned that both of her parents are teachers so she always had to take school very seriously. Besides, like her, her former husband is also a teacher. Back in 2018, Zendaya visited Fruitvale Elementary School, where her mother taught for over 20-years.

Claire Stoermer' relationship with her ex-husband

Claire and her ex-husband Kazembe Ajamu Coleman took vows in 2008. Although they belong to a different race, it never bothered the former couple and they were married for 8 years. However, they couldn’t last their marriage for a long time and got separated in the year 2016. Zendaya herself opened up on Twitter that her parents had split a long time. She tweeted, that her parents are not together for a long time but still are homies. Further, Claire didn’t want any spousal support from her husband, nor did she want the court to award him. Despite separating from each other, they did their parental duties pretty well.

Who is Claire Stoermer' ex-husband Kazembe Coleman?

Kazembe Ajamu Coleman was born in the United States. There is no further information about his date of birth, but we do know that he belongs to the Afro-American ethnic group. Kazembe is the descendant of Sharecroppers. [caption id="attachment_1206" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Claire was married to Kazembe for eight years. Source: HollywoodLife[/caption] He was born Samuel David Coleman, however, he changed it into Kazembe Ajamu Coleman after taking a DNA test that confirmed his African roots. Kazembe has five kids from his first wife, named Annabella, Austin, Julien, Karianna, and Kaylee. After separating from his first wife he started dating Claire who gave birth to Zendaya in 1996. Professionally he is a gym teacher. After the success of Zendaya, Kazembe started working as her manager, and her full-time bodyguard.

Claire's daughter Zendaya is proud to be biracial 

Zendaya Maree Stoermer Coleman was born on 1st September 1996 in Oakland, California, United States. She is an American actress and a singer who has played in different hit shows and movies like Shake it Up, Spiderman, Euphoria, and Dune. Moreover, she has also appeared in Taylor Swift's hit song “Bad Blood.” In addition, Zendaya is also a popular former Disney star who portrayed the role of Rocky Blue in the Disney series Shake it Up. [caption id="attachment_1204" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Claire's daughter Zendaya is a big movie star.[/caption] Zendaya is one of the most popular actresses of this generation. She has already bagged numerous awards because of her acting, like, Primetime Emmy Award, Critics Choice Award, Young Star Award, Young Artist Award, MTV Movie & TV Award, etc. The young star often admits that she is thankful to be a daughter of interracial parents. Zendaya released a video back in 2015 about her family history in which she said, “My mother is proud of where she’s from, and her history, and her past, and same with my dad. I have roots in Africa. Like, I am from Africa as well as from Germany, and I am very proud of that.”

Is Claire Stoermer active on any social media platforms?

Yes, Claire is quite active on Instagram where she has already bagged 122k followers. She posts about her jewelry, dogs, and her kitchen garden. [caption id="attachment_1201" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Claire is quite active on social media.[/caption] Talking about social media, her daughter Zendaya is also quite active on social media platforms where she has numerous fan followings on Instagram and Twitter. She has over 139 million followers on her Instagram whereas, she has 20.7 million followers on her Twitter account.

What is her net worth?

Claire estimated net worth is $500,000. She earned this sum from her teaching career and her jewelry collection. Meanwhile, her daughter Zendaya has an estimated net worth of $10 million as of 2022. She earned this sum of money all from her acting career.

title: Melyssa Davies
body:
Melyssa Davies is well known American celebrity. She became famous after her relationship with comedian James Murray. Besides, Melyssa works in the field of geriatric and hospice care. Her husband James is a famous comedian and an actor. The most remarkable work of Melyssa’s husband James is his appearance in the series, Impractical Jokers, which was viewed by over thirty-two million viewers in its first season only. In today's episode, let's have a closer view of Melyssa and her personal and professional life including her age, wedding, and job.

Melyssa Davies Early Life, Parents, Siblings

Melyssa Kim Davies was born on 13th March 1995, in Pennsylvania, United States. She is 27 years old by the year 2022. She holds American nationality. On the other hand, she belongs to the Caucasian ethnicity. Growing up she spent most of her time in her hometown. Melyssa is the daughter of her parents, Kim DiNofa and Ed Davies. Unfortunately, her parents got divorced a long time ago. Furthermore, she has a biological sister, Brittany Davies. Likewise, she also has a step-sister from her father's side named, Amanda Davies. [caption id="attachment_1151" align="aligncenter" width="455"] Melyssa Murray via her Instagram.[/caption] Furthermore, Melyssa did her schooling at a private school in Pennsylvania. She graduated from nursing school in 2018 and she is currently working in the health care system as a nurse.

What is Melyssa Davies’s Job?

She completed her nursing graduation and worked in the field of geriatric and hospice care since 2020. In addition, Melyssa is also an entrepreneur and founded the company WithoutThe Roots in 2019. She is the CEO and master designer of her company. WithoutTheRoots is a small business company that sells hand-made products in the United States. Her business especially focuses on products for home decors such as candles, wall mounts, custom wreaths, and charcuterie boards. All of these products are unique and hand-made.

Melyssa Davies' Relationship with Husband James Murray

Melyssa first met James in June 2018 at a party. From the get-go, Murr and Melyssa started talking but only as a friend. However, their relationship started to flourish quite quickly and soon they started dating. [caption id="attachment_1147" align="aligncenter" width="455"] Melyssa Murray and her spouse James Murray via Instagram.[/caption] Eventually, Murray proposed to Melyssa outside their house. He proposed to her with a beautiful Tiffany & Co. solitaire round diamond. Initially, he was not planning to propose to her outside the house as he wanted the proposal to be romantic. He had planned on proposing to her in Turks and Caicos where he first said I love you to her. Unfortunately, they couldn’t make it to the Bahamas because of Hurricane Dorian.

Inside the marriage ceremony of Melyssa and Murray

The pair tied the knot on 25th September 2020, almost after a year of engaging and living together. They exchanged vows in front of their family and some of their close friends. Unfortunately, they couldn't invite half of their guest because of the COVID-19 restriction. [caption id="attachment_1149" align="aligncenter" width="455"] Melyssa Murray as a bride on her wedding day[/caption] The wedding was held at Lake House Inn, Bucks County, Pennsylvania. The bride was clothed in a beautiful white wedding gown with a long veil. On the other hand, the groom was in a black suit, a bowtie, and glasses.

Melyssa’s Spouse James Murray’s personal and professional life

James Stephen Murray was born on May 1st, 1976 in the borough of Staten Island in New York City. He is of Irish and Italian descent. He attended Monsignor Farrell High School. Later, he graduated from Georgetown University, in Washington D.C. James is an actor, comedian, and producer. He made his acting debut in the movie, Private Parts. Later, James has been part of various other movies like Criss-Cross, Time Thugs, and The Comedy Roast of Jesus Christ.  [caption id="attachment_1148" align="aligncenter" width="455"] Melyssa and James in an event in New Orleans, Louisiana[/caption] Moreover, he also played in TV series like Down to Business, Gods of Medicine, and MacGyver. However, he got widely popular through his appearance in the Impractical Joker in which he has been the executive producer too. As a producer, he has produced a total of 2019 episodes from 2011 to 2021. Furthermore, his other work as a producer is Misery Index, Jokers Wild, and Say Whaaat?.

Is Melyssa Davies active on any social media platform?

Talking about her social media, she is active on Instagram and she has bagged more than 13k followers. She mostly updates her followers by posting photos and videos of herself, enjoying quality time with her friends and husband. Likewise, her husband James is also active on Instagram and has around 1.6 million followers. Like Melyssa, her husband James also posts pictures and videos with his wife. Currently, Melyssa is living in New York City along with her hubby.

What is Melyssa Davies' net worth?

Talking about Melyssa’s net worth, the celebrity spouse has an approximate total fortune of $350,000 Meanwhile, her husband's net worth is over $7 million as of 2022. James has mostly earned this fortune through acting and producing.

title: Nikki Frost
body:
Nicola Elizabeth Frost as known as Nikki Holland is a well-known English Photographer and Philanthropist. She is also widely popular because of her son Tom Holland. As we can say, the whole Holland family got popular after Tom became the Spiderman. Nikki is a reputed professional photographer who takes photos of actors, actresses, weddings, and other functions that interest her. Moreover, Nikki is also the wife of a popular media personality, Dominic Holland. In today's episode of our article let us dig inside the life of our friendly spiderman's mother Nikki Holland, her early life, parents, education, married life, children, and net worth.

Nikki Hollands' early life, education, and family

Nikki was born on 3rd September 1967 in London, England. She is the daughter of Robert Walter Frost and Christina Winifred Frost. When it comes to her nationality she is British having English ethnicity. Nikki happens to be the eldest child of her parents. She grew up with her two siblings Eve Frost and Tammy Frost. Moreover, she is also the granddaughter of Walter Frost and Fanny E. Frost. Talking about her education and career, Nikki has a design degree from Leeds University and over twenty years of experience as a professional photographer.

Nikki Hollands' relationship with her husband Dominic Holland

Nikki first met her husband Dominic at the Leed University, where they went together. They both fell in love and tied the knot after dating for over three years in a private ceremony. The duo hasn't shared much about their wedding date and venue and kept it secret. [caption id="attachment_1082" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Nikki Frost and Dominic Holland at the premiere of Captain America Civil war.[/caption] Sometimes later, they became a parent of four kids, Tom Holland, Sam Holland, Harry Holland, and Paddy Holland. Nikki has always maintained a low profile when it comes to bringing up her personal life and is not very indulging. She is her family's strongest supporter, especially for the growth of her sons. Besides, Nikki's husband Dominic Anthony Holland is not only a brilliant father and husband but he is also an English comedian, author, actor, and broadcaster. Dominic was born on 6th May 1967. Moreover, he started performing stand-up comedy in 1991. His one-man show won the Perrier Best Newcomer and grab the attention of numerous number of audience. Meanwhile, The Sunday Times described Dominic as “The UK's master of observational comedy”. Likewise, The Daily Telegraph said that “he is a top-notch stand-up comedian who everyone should see.”

Nikki Hollands elder son Tom Holland 

Nikki's son Tom Holland portrayed the role of Peter Parker in the Marvel Cinematic Universe, Spiderman, as well as in the Avengers movie. Tom was born on 1st June 1996 in Kingston upon Thames, United Kingdom. His full name is Thomas Stanley Holland. Tom is one of the most popular actors in Hollywood of this generation. [caption id="attachment_1084" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Popular actor Tom Holland with his mom Nikki Frost.[/caption] Meanwhile, Tom has already bagged several awards including a British Academy Film Award, three Saturn Awards, a Guinness World Record, and an appearance on the Forbes 30 Under 30 Europe list. Talking about his education, he studied at Donhead School, which is an all-male independent, preparatory day school. Later, Holland attended Wimbledon College, a voluntary aided Jesuit comprehensive school followed by the BRIT School for Performing Arts and Technology in Croydon.

Is Nikki Holland active on any social media platform?

Talking about Nikki’s social media account, she is quite active on Instagram. She has already bagged 257k followers. Since she is a professional photographer, she posts numerous photos on her social media handle. [caption id="attachment_1085" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Nikki Frost via her Instagram.[/caption] On the other hand, her elder son Tom also has a social media account. His popularity has already touched its peak and he has already bagged 66 million fan followings on his Instagram account.

What is the net worth of Nikki Holland?

When it comes to her net worth she might have collected a decent sum of money from her photography career. Meanwhile, her son Tom has already collected $15 million from his acting career.

title: Who Is Steven Piet? Everything About Joey King's Fiancé
body:
Steven Piet is a well-appreciated person in the Hollywood industry. He is an emerging American director, producer, cinematographer, videographer, editor, writer, and social media personality. More importantly, he is a boyfriend turned fiance of the famous American actress and model, Joey King. A multi-talented personality behind the curtains, Steven Piet became known to more people after he got engaged to Joey. The couple started dating in 2019 and have shared a romantic bond since. So, what Steven Piet is doing at present? How is his career panning out? How has been his relationship with Joey King? Let us find out all about Steven Piet. We will also talk about his early life, hobbies, net worth, and much more.

Steven Piet's Birth Place and Family Background

Steven Piet was born on May 19th, 1984, in Chicago, Illinois, United States. He was brought up in a Christian family and belongs to the white ethnic race. [caption id="attachment_1095" align="aligncenter" width="450"] A younger version of Steven Piet.[/caption] Talking about his family, he is the son of Anthony Piet Jr. and Sharon Piet. He is the only child among his parents. His parents raised him on the south side of Chicago. He is an incredibly private person who has rarely ever talked about his parents in public. That being said, he has once shared a photo of his dad wishing him a Happy birthday.
 
View this post on Instagram
 

A post shared by Steven Piet (@stevenpiet)

He shared a younger photo of his father and by just looking at it, we can say, Steven and his father are twins.

Steven Piet Is A Bachelor Degree Graduate

Steven Piet attended a local high school in order to receive basic education. After finishing high school, he then enrolled at Savannah College of Art and Design from 2002 to 2006 and accomplished Bachelor's degree in film, cinema, and video studies.

Steven Piet's Professional Career

Be it from direction to production, editing to writing, Steven Piet has worked in various fields of filmmaking throughout his career. We can say that Steven Piet's career started from a humble beginning.

Piet as an Assistant Editor

Steven piet had figured it out to be a director at an early age. After receiving graduation in film, cinema, and video studies, he started working as an assistant editor. From that very day, he began saving money in order to direct his debut movie.

Piet as a Cinematographer

Steven Piet's breakthrough into the professional field commenced in 2011 through the film " I Melt with You" directed by Mark Pellington. He worked as a crew member for the Camera and Electrical Department. Later, in 2013, he worked as a cinematographer and editor for the documentary drama "Girl Rising" directed by Richard Robbins.

Steven Piet Into Direction and Production

Finally, in 2015, Steven Piet made his directorial debut and achieved his childhood dream. He debuted as a director for the crime thriller "Uncle John" and even contributed as a writer alongside Erik Crary for the movie script. [caption id="attachment_1096" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Uncle John is the debut movie under Steven Piet's direction.[/caption] Likewise, in 2017, he was provided with the opportunity to direct 6 episodes of the popular anthology TV series "Channel Zero." He received a grand response from the public as well as the filmmaking community for his direction in the series. From this point, there was no looking back, and his career started cruising smoothly. Furthermore, in 2018, he produced 10 episodes of the Sci-fi series "Nightflyers." The following year, Steven co-produced and directed two vital episodes of the TV mini-series " The Act" starring his girlfriend Joey King in the lead role. He directed episode 5 "Plan B" as well as the final episode "Free" of the series. Joey King even promoted the fifth episode on her Instagram. The series was an instant success and received worldwide appreciation. [caption id="attachment_1097" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Joey King is a protagonist in "The Act" directed and produced by Steven Piet.[/caption] From 2019 to 2020, Steven directed and produced another TV series "Briarpatch." Besides producing 9 episodes, he even directed 3 episodes of the series. As of 2022, Steven Piet is signed with Universal Content Productions to develop scripted programming.

Steven Piet's Love life and Relationship

Joey King and Steven Piet, Each Other's Sweetheart Since 2019

Steven started dating an established Hollywood actress Joey King back in 2019 and the pair have shared a romantic bond since. However, the couple kept their relationship a secret initially. Later, in December 2020, they made their relationship public by posting a series of images featuring each other on the occasion of Christmas. [caption id="attachment_1100" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Steven Piet was spotted with his girlfriend Joey King out in Los Angeles back in 2020.[/caption] The couple never misses a single chance to hang out in their leisure time. Moreover, Steven and Joey have been cherishing their love life which is visible on their social media handles.

Steven is now Joey King's Fiance

After dating for almost three years, Steven and Joey got engaged earlier this year on 2nd February 2022 in the presence of their loved ones. Even the engagement was kept a secret. Then, a month later, they revealed the news of their engagement through their personal Instagram handles. The couple posted multiple pictures of each other with the overwhelming caption describing how lucky they were to share the journey together. [caption id="attachment_1107" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Steven Piet describes how he proposed to Joey King to be his life partner.[/caption] Well, by the looks of things, it seems Steven and Joey are in it for the long run. Here's hoping the pair persevere through life without any issues.

What else Steven Piet likes to do?

Besides filmmaking, Steven is fond of cooking and preparing delicious food items. Also, he enjoys traveling and exploring different places with his family as well as his fiance. Moreover, he loves goofing around with his two pet dogs and even posts pictures of them on his social media. [caption id="attachment_1125" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Steven Piet posted photos of his pet dogs on Instagram.[/caption]

How much is Steven Piet's net worth?

He handles different fields of filmmaking and is a certified professional. So, it won't be wrong to imply that he earns a good amount of money which enables him to lead a lavish life. As of 2022, his net worth is estimated to be around $1 million.

Is Steven Piet Active in Social Media Handles?

Steven is less active on social media platforms with a minimum amount of uploads through his accounts. He has Instagram and Facebook accounts. However, none of them are verified. Currently, Steven has 114K followers on his Instagram. On the other hand, his fiance Joey King is a celebrity on Instagram with a verified personal account. She has amassed a whopping 19 million followers on her Instagram.

title: Annette Evertson
body:
Annette Evertson is an ordinary US citizen. She came into the highlight as Shawn Bradley's wife. Her husband is a famous former professional basketball player. Bradley's wife Evertson was public but most of the information was not available. She is not active on any social media platforms. She has kept a very low profile. After more than 15-years of marriage, the couple parted ways. After the divorce, Shawn exchanged vows yet again, but what about Annette Evertson? What is she doing now? Find out about her wiki, parents, children, and more!

Who is Annette Evertson? Her Wiki

Annette Evertson was born on 13th August 1968, in Utah, the United States, one of two daughters between Karyn Evertsen and her husband. She spent the major portion of her childhood in West Valley, Utah. Besides, she has English ancestry and belongs to American nationality. She studied at a local school located in West Valley, UT. On the other hand, her former celebrity husband Shawn was born on March 22, 1972. He is the son of Rener and Teresa Bradley.

Bodyweight and Height

Annette has a very pleasing personality. She has fair skin and is very beautiful and gorgeous. She stands at a height of 5.3 ft height. Her eyes are dark brown and her hair color is blonde.

Annette Everston and Shawn Bradley Relationship: How did they first meet?

Annette and Shawn firstly met at the Mormon church in Philadelphia. She was in the church to talk about her mission experience in South Florida. And Bradley was in between the crowd. Bradley mentioned that he fell in love at first sight and was awestruck by Annette's beauty. The duo introduced themselves to each other, and before you know it, they started dating. While they were in a relationship, the pair used to spend a lot of time together. Whenever Shawn was out practicing she would always wait for him outside the matches hall.

Their relationship was in the spotlight due to their immense height difference

From the beginning, their relationship was in the great spotlight due to their height difference. The couple maintains the highlight because of their huge height difference, while Shawn is about 7 feet and 6 inches, Annette stands at about 5 feet and 3 inches. [caption id="attachment_1190" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Annette's spouse Shawn stands at a resounding height of 7ft[/caption] Everyone was judgemental and criticized the couple but they never gave up on their love. And after a few months of their lovey-dovey, they decided to get married.

Their Wedding

They get married in the presence of only important people in a very dream wedding destination. They exchanged vows on 25th  September 1993 in the Salt Lake temple. Despite all the judgments on their love affairs due to height, both of them never get affected by it. Bradley also mentioned that Annette has preserved his morals several times on his worst days too.

Annette Evertson and Bradley's children

From their marital life, the couple became a parent of six children. They have four daughters named Chelsea, Ceira, Charity, and Cheyenne, and two sons Chase and Chance. [caption id="attachment_1189" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Annette with her kids and grand kids. Source: Facebook[/caption] Well, Shawn initially wanted 15 kids in total, however, Annette decided to stop popping out babies after seven. Nonetheless, the former flames settled for six, in the end. Meanwhile, their daughter Charity is an athlete and she plays volleyball for Washington State University.

Annette and Bradley Divorce: What was the reason?

The couple was in a good relationship and were quite happy with each other. Bradley once even mentioned that he cannot imagine her life without Annette. And when the news of their split came to the public, fans were shocked and heartbroken. At first, news of their separation was not believed, but unfortunately, they were indeed true. Some sources also claimed that she gave her best just so their marriage won't break. But regardless of the efforts given by Annette, their marriage relationship came to an end. After a blissful married life of 24 years, the couple decided to part ways and end their marriage legally. They took divorce in 2017. The reason behind their divorce is still a mystery. Sometimes after her divorce, Bradley married Carrie Cannon in January of 2018 and also adopted her three children. On the other hand, Annette hasn't married anyone till now. Both Annette and Shawn are doing well in their life. Bradley shares happy pictures with his second wife.

Info about her ex-husband

Shawn Bradley is a popular former professional German- American Basketball player. He is nicknamed "The Stormin Mormon" as he is one of the tallest basketball players in NBA history. He played center for the Philadelphia 76ers,  New Jersy Nets, and Dallas Mavericks. Bradley is also popular as an actor. He played a role in the film Space Jam in 1996, a cameo in a movie named The Singles Ward as an auto mechanic, and also featured in an episode of the series, Walker. He also appeared in a music video paying tribute to Jimmer's Fredette along with featuring in the 30 short documentaries on ESPN 30. After he got retired he got involved with West Ridge Academy which is a coeducational private school for at-risk youths in West Jordan. He also does a lot of charitable events, and helps donates to the children affected by HIV and AIDS. In 2021, while riding the bicycle in the street of St.George he got struck from behind by a motorist causing a spinal cord injury to his neck. He was admitted to the hospital for a couple of weeks and underwent neck fusion surgery. In an interview after the operation, he stated that his family is moving toward a wheelchair-friendly house in Texas and to give continuation on his recovery.

Where is Annette Evertson now?

After getting divorced from Bradley, it looks like Annette is not married to anyone. Meanwhile, her husband is now living a happy life with another woman. [caption id="attachment_1188" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Annette is currently single and not married.[/caption] Even after the divorce, she is not public rather she has become more private and chosen to stay low-key. She is active on Facebook where she usually posts about her day-to-day life with her kids and family.

Annette net worth

Annette's professional life is not been public and her primary work is also unknown and private. But from the few sources, it has been estimated that her net worth is $600,000. Whereas her ex-husband is a basketball player and also a well-known actor so his net worth is estimated to be $27 million as of 2022. He earned from promoting and endorsing brands.

title: Emily's Ears
body:
Emily's Ears is a social media star with impaired hearing. She has gained several fans on her Instagram and other social media handles through her entertaining videos. Initially, Emily was a member of the Adrian and Emily web group along with her ex-boyfriend which also helped her get fame to some extent. Later, she created her own YouTube channel and started uploading videos there. She is active on almost all social media platforms with a good fan following. Despite having hearing issues, Emily has made her own identity in the entertainment field. Looking at her work, nobody can say she has difficulty in hearing. Emily along with her family members has an ally Loudegange where we can see the collective effort of all the family members. In fact, all the members of the family are social media influencers. Here, let's know what Emily has been doing these days, her dating life, and also find out if the social media star is pregnant!

What Is Emily's Ears' Real Name And Age?

Born Emily Moore on 3rd December 2002, the social media icon is 19 years old. She will turn 20 in December of 2022. Born in the U.S., she has American nationality and belongs to mixed ethnicity. Moreover, her astrological sign is Sagittarius, and she follows Christianity. Talking about her education, she hasn't revealed her educational background. Considering her age, she must be in college.

Emily's Ears' Family is Full of Social Media Stars

The social media influencer is the daughter of George Moore and Elisabeth Moore. Her mom is also quite famous on social media with 174k followers on Instagram, 18.2k on TikTok, and 4.92k subscribers on YouTube. Unlike her mother, their dad doesn't seem to be a big fan of cameras. His absence from all the social networks suggests Emily's father is not fond of social media. Despite the fact, her old man supports his kids and wife but has a minimum presence in their posts. [caption id="attachment_958" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Emily's Ears with her brother Richboy Troy, sister Steph Thomas carrying her baby, and mother Elisabeth in between.[/caption] Likewise, Moore's brother and sister are also social media influencers with relatively good numbers of followers.

Who Are Emily's Ears' Siblings?

Ears' has a younger brother who is famous on social media by the name Richboy Troy. Born in 2006, he is a skit creator and an actor. Additionally, her brother is popular for his rap music. On the other hand, her elder sister Steph Thomas who was born in 1998 is also a YouTube star. She is a model and a YouTuber. She is popular for her prank videos and interviews. As of 2022, she has over 200k subscribers on her YouTube channel and 694k followers on Instagram. Besides, Emily also has another sister Zahara who is not as famous as her other siblings. Yet, she has 31.7k followers on Instagram.

Emily Moore Is Currently Dating Her Boyfriend Kadin Oneekgg

The love relationship between Emily's Ears and her boyfriend Kadin Oneekgg is quite open on social media. Though many of the tabloids reported the couple broken up, it just seems to be some made-up baseless rumors. The duo is still together and having a great time. The romantic lovers also own a combined YouTube channel. Moving back to their love story, they started dating in 2019. Emily shared an intimate couple photo on Instagram on July 18, 2021 writing, "2 years down, forever to go..." Then again on November 16, 2021, she made a beautiful post where she wrote, "You will always be my heart and soulmate💋 #happyanniversary baby👅." [caption id="attachment_1164" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Emily and Kadin Oneekgg are dating since 2019.[/caption] Like her, Emily's boyfriend also owns an Insta account with the name "oneekgg" and has 462k followers. As he writes "Loyalty Over Anything," on his Insta bio, maybe he will never cheat or leave his girlfriend. The now and then posted pictures and videos of the lovebirds show how deeply they are in love. We can see their relationship is only growing stronger and the pair are enjoying their love life to the fullest.

Is Emily Ears Pregnant?

Even though Emily has just crossed her teenagehood, she is soon going to be a mom. Yes, you heard it right. Emily is pregnant!!! She has said quite a lot of times on her social media that she is having a baby.
 
View this post on Instagram
 

A post shared by MAIN PAGE💞 (@emilys_ears)

Even so, it is still blurry if the news is true as the couple often makes prank videos. Emily along with her boyfriend has fooled their viewers so many times with such pranks so, it is hard to believe them until we find some solid proof. Anyway, we wish them good luck if they are having a baby and if not, we hope they will have one soon.

Who is Emily Ears' Ex-Boyfriend?

Before Kadin, Emily was dating a guy named Adrian aka Smurftz. The former couple dated for a couple of years until 2019. Her ex-partner was also hearing impaired. Though they are no more together now, the ex-couple started their social media career together. In fact, they had a YouTube channel "Adrian and Emily" in 2018. [caption id="attachment_959" align="aligncenter" width="450"] Emily's Ears alongside her ex-boyfriend Adrian[/caption] However, their relationship couldn't long last and they broke up after some time of dating. The duo even deleted their YouTube channel later.

Emily Ears' Is On Instagram, TikTok, And YouTube

Being a social media star, Emily is highly active on all social media sites. She has an Instagram account under the name "emily_ears," where she often shares her modeling photos and fashionable outfits. She has 1.8m followers on Insta her account. Moreover, she also keeps sharing close and eye-catching pictures with her current boyfriend. Not only Emily is popular on Insta, but she also has a good number of subscribers on her YouTube account. Her channel has amassed over 718k subscribers so far. Ears' is mostly known for her challenges, pranks, vlogs, and fashion style content. In addition, she also has collaborated YouTube channel called "Emily&Kadin4L" with her boyfriend. Created on March 3, 2020, it has already 102k subscribers. Now coming to her TikTok, the star has 36.7k followers on her account named "emily_.ears_" but it looks like she is not posting much on her official account.

Net Worth

As of 2022, Emily Ears' net worth is $1.5 million. Having such a good fan following on every major social media handle, it is no surprise to have the above-mentioned figure. She will earn more and more in the coming future.
